trait.name: Unarmored Defense
entries: Если вампир не носит доспехов и не владеет щитом, его AC включает модификатор мудрости.

action.name: Multiattack
entries: Вампир совершает три атаки, только одна из которых может быть атакой "Укус".

action.name: Claws
entries: {@atk mw} {@hit 6} попадание, досягаемость 5 футов, одно существо. {@h}8 ({@damage 2d4 + 3}) косых повреждений. Вместо нанесения урона вампир может схватить цель (побег {@dc 13}).

action.name: Unarmed Strike
entries: {@atk mw} {@hit 6} попадание, досягаемость 5 футов, одна цель. {@h}5 ({@damage 1d4 + 3}) повреждений от удара. Если цель - существо, оно должно успешно пройти спасбросок на {@dc 13} конституцию или быть {@condition stunned} до конца следующего хода вампира.

action.name: Bite
entries: {@atk mw} {@hit 6} попадание, досягаемость 5 футов, одно желающее существо, или существо, которое {@condition grappled} вампиром, недееспособно или {@condition restrained}. {@h}6 ({@damage 1d6 + 3}) колющих повреждений плюс 7 ({@damage 2d6}) некротических повреждений. Максимальное количество хит-пойнтов цели уменьшается на величину, равную полученному некротическому урону, и вампир восстанавливает хит-пойнты на эту величину. Снижение длится до тех пор, пока цель не закончит длительный отдых. Цель умирает, если этот эффект снижает ее максимальное количество хит-пойнтов до 0.

monster.name: Vampire Spawn Glamour Bard
languages: The languages it knew in life

trait.name: Regeneration
entries: Вампир восстанавливает 10 хит-пойнтов в начале своего хода, если у него есть хотя бы 1 хит-пойнт и он не находится под солнечным светом или проточной водой. Если вампир получает лучевой урон или урон от святой воды, эта черта не действует в начале следующего хода вампира.

trait.name: Spider Climb
entries: Вампир может карабкаться по сложным поверхностям, в том числе вверх ногами по потолку, без необходимости делать проверку способностей.

trait.name: Sunlight Hypersensitivity
entries: Вампир получает 20 лучевых повреждений, когда начинает свой ход под солнечным светом. Находясь под солнечным светом, он имеет недостаток при бросках атаки и проверке способностей.

trait.name: Vampire Weaknesses
entries: Вампир имеет следующие недостатки:

items.name: Forbiddance.
items.entry: Вампир не может войти в жилище без приглашения одного из жильцов.

items.name: Harmed by Running Water.
items.entry: Вампир получает 20 повреждений кислотой, когда заканчивает свой ход в проточной воде.

items.name: Stake to the Heart.
items.entry: Вампир уничтожается, если в его сердце попадает колющее оружие из дерева, пока он находится {@condition incapacitated} в своем покое.

action.name: Multiattack
entries: Вампир делает две атаки, только одна из которых может быть атакой "Укус".

action.name: Claws
entries: {@atk mw} {@hit 6} попадание, досягаемость 5 футов, одно существо. {@h}8 ({@damage 2d4 + 3}) косых повреждений. Вместо нанесения урона вампир может схватить цель (побег {@dc 13}).

action.name: Bite
entries: {@atk mw} {@hit 6} попадание, досягаемость 5 футов, одно желающее существо, или существо, которое {@condition grappled} вампиром, недееспособно или {@condition restrained}. {@h}6 ({@damage 1d6 + 3}) колющих повреждений плюс 7 ({@damage 2d6}) некротических повреждений. Максимальное количество хит-пойнтов цели уменьшается на величину, равную полученному некротическому урону, и вампир восстанавливает хит-пойнты на эту величину. Снижение длится до тех пор, пока цель не закончит длительный отдых. Цель умирает, если этот эффект снижает ее максимальное количество хит-пойнтов до 0.

reaction.name: Mantle of Majesty (Recharges after a Long Rest)
entries: Вампир произносит команду, не тратя слот заклинания. В течение 1 минуты или пока не закончится концентрация (как если бы он концентрировался на заклинании), он может произнести команду в качестве бонусного действия в каждый свой ход, не тратя слот заклинания. Любое существо, очарованное им, автоматически проваливает бросок на спасение против команды, которую он произносит с помощью этой способности.

spellcasting.name: Innate Spellcasting
headerEntries: The vampire casts one of the following spells using Charisma as the spellcasting ability (spell save {@dc 15}):

monster.name: Vampire Spawn Commander
languages: The languages it knew in life

trait.name: Regeneration
entries: Вампир восстанавливает 10 хит-пойнтов в начале своего хода, если у него есть хотя бы 1 хит-пойнт и он не находится под солнечным светом или проточной водой. Если вампир получает лучевой урон или урон от святой воды, эта черта не действует в начале следующего хода вампира.

trait.name: Spider Climb
entries: Вампир может карабкаться по сложным поверхностям, в том числе вверх ногами по потолку, без необходимости делать проверку способностей.

trait.name: Vampire Weaknesses
entries: Вампир имеет следующие недостатки:

items.name: Forbiddance.
items.entry: Вампир не может войти в жилище без приглашения одного из жильцов.

items.name: Harmed by Running Water.
items.entry: Вампир получает 20 повреждений кислотой, когда заканчивает свой ход в проточной воде.

items.name: Stake to the Heart.
items.entry: Вампир уничтожается, если в его сердце попадает колющее оружие из дерева, пока он находится {@condition incapacitated} в своем покое.

action.name: Multiattack
entries: The vampire uses Maneuver Allies, if available. It then makes three attacks, only one of which can be a Bite attack.

action.name: Greatsword
entries: {@atk mw} {@hit 8} попадание, радиус действия 5 футов, одна цель. {@h}11 ({@damage 2d6 + 4}) косой урон.

action.name: Claws
entries: {@atk mw} {@hit 8} to hit, reach 5 ft., one creature. {@h}9 ({@damage 2d4 + 4}) slashing damage. Instead of dealing damage, the vampire can grapple the target (escape {@dc 14}).

action.name: Bite
entries: {@atk mw} {@hit 8} to hit, reach 5 ft., one willing creature, or a creature that is {@condition grappled} by the vampire, incapacitated, or {@condition restrained}. {@h}7 ({@damage 1d6 + 4}) piercing damage plus 7 ({@damage 2d6}) necrotic damage. The target's hit point maximum is reduced by an amount equal to the necrotic damage taken, and the vampire regains hit points equal to that amount. The reduction lasts until the target finishes a long rest. The target dies if this effect reduces its hit point maximum to 0.

action.name: Maneuver Allies {@recharge 5}
entries: Up to four allies within 60 feet of the vampire that can hear it can each use their reaction to move up to half their speed without provoking {@action opportunity attack|PHB|opportunity attacks}.

bonus.name: Battle Command
entries: The vampire targets one ally it can see within 30 feet of it. If the target can see or hear the vampire, the target can use its reaction to make one melee attack or to take the {@action Dodge} or {@action Hide} action.

reaction.name: Directed Strike (3/Day)
entries: When a creature the vampire can see within 30 feet of it makes an attack roll, and the creature can hear the vampire, the vampire grants advantage to that roll.

trait.name: Magic Resistance
entries: The ursinal has advantage on saving throws against spells and other magical effects.

trait.name: Speak With Beasts
entries: The ursinal can communicate with beasts as if they shared a language.

trait.name: Spell Penetration
entries: When the ursinal casts a spell and is interrupted by an enemy's {@spell counterspell}, treat the spell's level as 3 levels higher.

action.name: Multiattack
entries: The ursinal makes one Bite attack and two Claw attacks.

action.name: Bite
entries: {@atk mw} {@hit 8} to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. {@h}9 ({@damage 1d8 + 5}) piercing damage.

action.name: Claw
entries: {@atk mw} {@hit 8} to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. {@h}8 ({@damage 1d6 + 5}) slashing damage and if the target is a creature, it is {@condition grappled} (escape {@dc 16}). Until this grapple ends, the target is {@condition restrained}.

spellcasting.name: Innate Spellcasting
headerEntries: The ursinal casts one of the following spells, requiring no material components and using Charisma as the spellcasting ability (spell save {@dc 15}):

trait.name: Sunlight Sensitivity
entries: While in sunlight, the kobold has disadvantage on attack rolls, as well as on Wisdom ({@skill Perception}) checks that rely on sight.

trait.name: Pack Tactics
entries: The kobold has advantage on an attack roll against a creature if at least one of the kobold's allies is within 5 feet of the creature and the ally isn't {@condition incapacitated}.

trait.name: Dark One's Own Luck (Recharges After A Short Or Long Rest)
entries: rWhen the kobold makes an ability check or saving throw, it can add a d10 to the roll. It can do this after the roll is made but before any of the roll's effects occur.

action.name: Javelin
entries: {@atk mw,rw} {@hit 4} to hit, reach 5 ft. or range 30/120 ft., one target. {@h}5 ({@damage 1d6 + 2}) piercing damage.

spellcasting.name: Innate Spellcasting
headerEntries: The kobold casts one of the following spells using Charisma as the spellcasting ability (spell save {@dc 12}, {@hit 4} to hit with spell attacks):

trait.name: Kuraulyek's Tongue
entries: The kobold can communicate with ordinary bats and giant bats.

trait.name: Sunlight Sensitivity
entries: While in sunlight, the kobold has disadvantage on attack rolls, as well as on Wisdom ({@skill Perception}) checks that rely on sight.

trait.name: Pack Tactics
entries: The kobold has advantage on an attack roll against a creature if at least one of the kobold's allies is within 5 feet of the creature and the ally isn't {@condition incapacitated}.

action.name: Multiattack
entries: The kobold makes two melee attacks or two ranged attacks.

action.name: Dagger
entries: {@atk mw} {@hit 4} to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. {@h}4 ({@damage 1d4 + 2}) piercing damage and if the target is a creature, it takes 3 ({@damage 1d6}) necrotic damage and the kobold regains hit points equal to half the amount of necrotic damage dealt.

action.name: Javelin
entries: {@atk mw,rw} {@hit 4} to hit, reach 5 ft. or range 30/120 ft., one target. {@h}5 ({@damage 1d6 + 2}) piercing damage.

bonus.name: Command Bat
entries: The kobold targets one allied beast (bat types only) it can see within 30 feet of it. If the target can see or hear the kobold, the target can use its reaction to move up to half their speed and make one melee attack.

bonus.name: Summon Bat (Recharges after a Short or Long Rest)
entries: The kobold summons {@dice 3d6} bats, 1 giant bat, or 1 swarm of bats. The bats appear in unoccupied spaces within 30 feet of the kobold and acts as its allies. The bats act right after the kobold on the same initiative count and fight until they're destroyed. They remain for 1 hour, until they or the kobold dies, or until the kobold dismisses them as an action.

spellcasting.name: Innate Spellcasting
headerEntries: The kobold casts one of the following spells, requiring no material components and using Wisdom as the spellcasting ability:

legendary.name: Charge
entries: The kobold moves up to its speed.

legendary.name: Javelin
entries: The kobold makes a Javelin attack.

legendary.name: Dagger (Costs 2 Actions)
entries: The kobold makes a Dagger attack.

resist.note: from nonmagical attacks that aren't silvered

trait.name: Devil's Sight
entries: Magical darkness doesn't impede the fallen archon's {@sense darkvision}.

trait.name: Improved Critical
entries: The fallen archon's weapon attacks score a critical hit on a roll of 19 or 20.

trait.name: Corrupting Gaze
entries: Provided the fallen archon isn't {@condition incapacitated}, if a non-evil creature starts its turn within 30 feet of the fallen archon and the two of them can see each other, the fallen archon can force the creature to make a {@dc 17} Wisdom saving throw. On a failed save, the creature is {@condition charmed} by the fallen archon until the start of its next turn. While {@condition charmed} in this way, a creature suffers the effect of the dominate monster spell without making a saving throw and treats all enemies of the fallen archon as its enemies. The fallen archon doesn't need to concentrate on the spell.

A creature that isn't surprised can avert its eyes to avoid the saving throw at the start of its turn. If it does so, it can't see the fallen archon until the start of its next turn, when it can avert its eyes again.

If it looks at the fallen archon in the meantime, it must immediately make the save. If a creature's saving throw is successful, the creature is immune to the fallen archon's Corrupting Gaze for the next 24 hours.

trait.name: Magic Resistance
entries: The fallen archon has advantage on saving throws against spells and other magical effects.

action.name: Multiattack
entries: The fallen archon makes three Greatsword attacks, or makes one Greatsword attack and casts one spell that takes 1 action to cast.

action.name: Greatsword
entries: {@atk mw} +12 to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. {@h}21 ({@damage 4d6 + 7}) slashing damage plus 13 ({@damage 3d8}) necrotic damage.

action.name: Teleport
entries: The fallen archon magically teleports, along with any equipment it is wearing or carrying and any creatures it has grappled, up to 60 feet to an unoccupied space it can see.

spellcasting.name: Innate Spellcasting
headerEntries: The tyrant archon's innate spellcasting ability is Charisma (spell save {@dc 17}). It can innately cast the following spells, requiring no material components:

trait.name: Amphibious
entries: The dragon can breathe air and water.

trait.name: Multi-headed
entries: The dragon has advantage on Wisdom ({@skill Perception}) checks and on saving throws against being {@condition blinded}, charmed, deafened, frightened, stunned, and knocked {@condition unconscious}. For each head the dragon has beyond one, it gets an extra reaction that can be used only for {@action opportunity attack|PHB|opportunity attacks}..

action.name: Multiattack
entries: The dragon makes two Bite attacks and two Claw attacks.

action.name: Bite
entries: {@atk mw} {@hit 7} to hit, reach 10 ft., one target. {@h}15 ({@damage 2d10 + 4}) piercing damage plus 4 ({@damage 1d8}) acid damage.

action.name: Claw
entries: {@atk mw} {@hit 7} попадание, радиус действия 5 футов, одна цель. {@h}11 ({@damage 2d6 + 4}) косой урон.

action.name: Acid Breath {@recharge 4}
entries: The dragon exhales acid in a 30-foot line that is 5 feet wide. Each creature in that line must make a {@dc 14} Dexterity saving throw, taking 49 ({@damage 11d8}) acid damage on a failed save, or half as much damage on a successful one.

trait.name: Amphibious
entries: The dragon can breathe air and water.

trait.name: Legendary Resistance (3/Day)
entries: If the dragon fails a saving throw, it can choose to succeed instead.

trait.name: Multi-headed
entries: The dragon has advantage on Wisdom ({@skill Perception}) checks and on saving throws against being {@condition blinded}, {@condition charmed}, {@condition deafened}, {@condition frightened}, {@condition stunned}, and knocked {@condition unconscious}. For each head the dragon has beyond one, it gets an extra reaction that can be used only for {@action opportunity attack|PHB|opportunity attacks}.

action.name: Multiattack
entries: The dragon can use its Frightful Presence. It then makes two Claw attacks and one Tail attack.

action.name: Claw
entries: {@atk mw} +15 to hit, reach 10 ft., one target. {@h}15 ({@damage 2d6 + 8}) slashing damage.

action.name: Tail
entries: {@atk mw} +15 to hit, reach 20 ft., one target. {@h}17 ({@damage 2d8 + 8}) bludgeoning damage.

action.name: Bite
entries: {@atk mw} +15 to hit, reach 15 ft., one target. {@h}19 ({@damage 2d10 + 8}) piercing damage plus 9 ({@damage 2d8}) acid damage.

action.name: Frightful Presence
entries: Each creature of the dragon's choice that is within 120 feet of the dragon and aware of it must succeed on a {@dc 19} Wisdom saving throw or become {@condition frightened} for 1 minute. A creature can repeat the saving throw at the end of each of its turns, ending the effect on itself on a success. If a creature's saving throw is successful or the effect ends for it, the creature is immune to the dragon's Frightful Presence for the next 24 hours.

action.name: Acid Breath {@recharge 4}
entries: The dragon exhales acid in a 90-foot line that is 10 feet wide. Each creature in that line must make a {@dc 22} Dexterity saving throw, taking 67 ({@damage 15d8}) acid damage on a failed save, or half as much damage on a successful one.

legendary.name: Detect
entries: The dragon makes a Wisdom ({@skill Perception}) check.

legendary.name: Acid Breath (Costs 2 Actions)
entries: The dragon uses Acid Breath, if available.

legendary.name: Bite (Costs 2 Actions)
entries: The dragon makes a Bite attack.

legendary.name: Wing Attack (Costs 2 Actions)
entries: The dragon beats its wings. Each creature within 15 feet of the dragon must succeed on a {@dc 23} Dexterity saving throw or take 15 ({@damage 2d6 +8}) bludgeoning damage and be knocked {@condition prone}. The dragon can then fly up to half its flying speed.

trait.name: Amphibious
entries: The dragon can breathe air and water.

trait.name: Legendary Resistance (3/Day)
entries: If the dragon fails a saving throw, it can choose to succeed instead.

trait.name: Multi-headed
entries: The dragon has advantage on Wisdom ({@skill Perception}) checks and on saving throws against being {@condition blinded}, {@condition charmed}, {@condition deafened}, {@condition frightened}, {@condition stunned}, and knocked {@condition unconscious}. For each head the dragon has beyond one, it gets an extra reaction that can be used only for {@action opportunity attack|PHB|opportunity attacks}.

action.name: Multiattack
entries: The dragon can use its Frightful Presence. It then makes two Claw attacks and one Tail attack.

action.name: Claw
entries: {@atk mw} +11 к попаданию, досягаемость 5 футов, одна цель. {@h}13 ({@damage 2d6 + 6}) косой урон.

action.name: Tail
entries: {@atk mw} +11 to hit, reach 15 ft., one target. {@h}15 ({@damage 2d8 + 6}) bludgeoning damage.

action.name: Bite
entries: {@atk mw} +11 to hit, reach 10 ft., one target. {@h}17 ({@damage 2d10 + 6}) piercing damage plus 4 ({@damage 1d8}) acid damage.

action.name: Frightful Presence
entries: Каждое существо по выбору дракона, находящееся в пределах 120 футов от дракона и знающее о нем, должно успешно выполнить бросок спасброска на {@dc 16} Мудрость или стать {@condition frightened} на 1 минуту. Существо может повторять бросок спасброска в конце каждого своего хода, прекращая эффект на себя в случае успеха. Если бросок спасброска для существа успешен или эффект заканчивается для него, существо становится неуязвимым для "Страшного присутствия" дракона на следующие 24 часа.

action.name: Acid Breath {@recharge 4}
entries: The dragon exhales acid in a 60-foot line that is 5 feet wide. Each creature in that line must make a {@dc 18} Dexterity saving throw, taking 54 ({@damage 12d8}) acid damage on a failed save, or half as much damage on a successful one.

legendary.name: Detect
entries: The dragon makes a Wisdom ({@skill Perception}) check.

legendary.name: Acid Breath (Costs 2 Actions)
entries: The dragon uses Acid Breath, if available.

legendary.name: Bite (Costs 2 Actions)
entries: The dragon makes a Bite attack.

legendary.name: Wing Attack (Costs 2 Actions)
entries: The dragon beats its wings. Each creature within 10 feet of the dragon must succeed on a {@dc 19} Dexterity saving throw or take 13 ({@damage 2d6 + 6}) bludgeoning damage and be knocked {@condition prone}. The dragon can then fly up to half its flying speed.

trait.name: Aura of Menace
entries: The archon emanates an aura of menace in a 30-foot radius. The first time any enemy creature enters the aura or starts its turn there during a battle, the creature must succeed on a {@dc 16} Wisdom saving throw or become {@condition frightened} of the archon for 1 minute or until it takes any damage.

trait.name: Magic Resistance
entries: Архонт имеет преимущество в бросках спасения против заклинаний и других магических эффектов.

action.name: Multiattack
entries: The archon makes three Buisine attacks.

action.name: Buisine
entries: {@atk mw} {@hit 8} to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. {@h}11 ({@damage 2d6 + 4}) bludgeoning damage plus 13 ({@damage 3d8}) radiant damage.

action.name: Teleport
entries: The archon magically teleports, along with any equipment it is wearing or carrying and any creatures it has grappled, up to 60 feet to an unoccupied space it can see.

action.name: Herald's Call {@recharge 5}
entries: The archon plays its buisine to create a sound of utter clarity and piercing beauty. Each non-celestial creature within 120 feet that can hear the archon must succeed on a {@dc 16} Wisdom saving throw or become {@condition charmed} for 1 minute. A creature charmed in this way is {@condition paralyzed}. A creature can repeat the saving throw at the end of each of its turns, ending the effect on itself on a success. If a creature's saving throw is successful or the effect ends for it, the creature is immune to the archon's Herald's Call for the next 24 hours.

action.name: Buisine Blast (1/Day)
entries: The archon blows its buisine to emit a thunderous blast in a 60-foot cone that is audible 600 feet away. Each creature in the cone must make a {@dc 16} Constitution saving throw. On a failed save, a creature takes 54 ({@damage 12d8}) thunder damage and is {@condition deafened} for 1 minute. If a target's saving throw fails by 5 or more, the creature is also {@condition stunned} until the end of its next turn. On a successful save, a creature takes half as much damage and isn't {@condition deafened}. Creatures and objects made of glass or crystal have disadvantage on the saving throw and take 108 ({@damage 24d8}) thunder damage instead of 54 ({@damage 12d8}).

spellcasting.name: Innate Spellcasting
headerEntries: The trumpet archon's innate spellcasting ability is Charisma (spell save {@dc 16}). It can innately cast the following spells, requiring no material components:

trait.name: False Appearance
entries: While the revenant remains motionless, it is indistinguishable from a normal tree.

trait.name: Regeneration
entries: Мститель восстанавливает 10 хит-поинтов в начале своего хода. Если мститель получает урон от огня или излучения, эта черта не действует в начале следующего хода мстителя. Тело мстителя разрушается, только если он начинает свой ход с 0 хит-пойнтов и не восстанавливается.

trait.name: Rejuvenation
entries: When the revenant's body is destroyed, its soul lingers. After 24 hours, the soul inhabits and animates another treant corpse on the same plane of existence and regains all its hit points. While the soul is bodiless, a wish spell can be used to force the soul to go to the afterlife and not return.

trait.name: Siege Monster
entries: The revenant deals double damage to objects and structures.

trait.name: Turn Immunity
entries: Мститель невосприимчив к эффектам, обращающим нежить.

trait.name: Vengeful Strikes
entries: Если цель, пораженная ближней атакой мстителя, является существом, против которого мститель поклялся отомстить, цель получает дополнительные 14 ({@damage 4d6}) урона от оружия.

trait.name: Vengeful Tracker
entries: Мститель знает расстояние и направление движения любого существа, против которого он жаждет мести, даже если существо и мститель находятся на разных планах существования. Если существо, за которым следит мститель, умирает, мститель знает об этом.

action.name: Multiattack
entries: The revenant makes two Slam attacks.

action.name: Slam
entries: {@atk mw} +11 to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. {@h}17 ({@damage 3d6 + 7}) bludgeoning damage.

action.name: Rock
entries: {@atk rw} +11 to hit, range 60/180 ft., one target. {@h}29 ({@damage 4d10 + 7}) bludgeoning damage.

action.name: Animate Trees (1/Day)
entries: The revenant magically animates one or two trees it can see within 60 feet of it. These trees have the same statistics as a treant, except they have Intelligence and Charisma scores of 1, they can't speak, and they have only the Slam action option. An animated tree acts as an ally of the revenant. The tree remains animate for 1 day or until it dies; until the revenant dies or is more than 120 feet from the tree; or until the revenant takes a bonus action to turn it back into an inanimate tree. The tree then takes root if possible.

action.name: Vengeful Glare
entries: The revenant targets one creature it can see within 30 feet of it and against which it has sworn vengeance. The target must make a {@dc 16} Wisdom saving throw. On a failure, the target is {@condition paralyzed} until the revenant deals damage to it, or until the end of the revenant's next turn. When the paralysis ends, the target is {@condition frightened} of the revenant for 1 minute. The {@condition frightened} target can repeat the saving throw at the end of each of its turns, with disadvantage if it can see the revenant, ending the {@condition frightened} condition on itself on a success.

trait.name: Shapechanger
entries: At night, the tiktik can use its action to polymorph into its Fiend Form or back into its true form, which is humanoid. In Fiend Form, the tiktik appears as a hybrid humanoid vampire bat. Its statistics, other than its Speed, damage, and damage resistances, are the same in each form. It reverts to its true form at dawn or if it dies. While transformed, the tiktik also gains the following features.

items: The tiktik's creature type changes to fiend.
The tiktik has advantage on Strength and Dexterity checks and Strength and Dexterity saving throws.
When it makes a melee weapon attack, the tiktik gains a {@hit 3} bonus to the damage roll (included in the attack).
The tiktik can climb difficult surfaces, including upside down on ceilings, without needing to make an ability check.
If the tiktik starts its turn within 10 feet of a pound of salt or garlic, it becomes {@condition poisoned} until the start of its next turn.

trait.name: Keen Hearing And Smell
entries: The tiktik has advantage on Wisdom ({@skill Perception}) checks that rely on hearing or smell.

action.name: Multiattack
entries: The tiktik makes two attacks. two with its Dagger (humanoid form) or one with its Tongue and one with its Talons (fiend form).

action.name: Tongue (Fiend Form Only)
entries: {@atk mw} {@hit 4} to hit, reach 10 ft., one target. {@h}7 ({@damage 1d4 + 5}) piercing damage, and the tiktik's tongue attaches to the target. While attached, the tiktik can't attack with its tongue. Instead, at the start of each of the tiktik's turns, the target loses 7 ({@damage 1d4 + 5}) hit points and the tiktik gains temporary hit points equal to the amount of hit points lost by the target.
If the target is {@condition unconscious} and takes damage or loses hit points, it must succeed on a {@dc 12} Constitution saving throw or fail to notice the attack.

The tiktik can detach its tongue by using a bonus action. It does so after it drains 15 hit points of blood from the target or the target dies. A creature, including the target, can use its action to detach the tiktik's tongue.

action.name: Talons (Fiend Form Only)
entries: {@atk mw} {@hit 4} to hit, reach 5 ft., one creature. Hit: 10 ({@damage 2d4 + 5}) slashing damage.

action.name: Dagger (Humanoid Form Only)
entries: {@atk mw,rw} {@hit 4} to hit, reach 5 ft. or range 20/60 ft., one target. {@h}4 ({@damage 1d4 + 2}) piercing damage.

trait.name: Keen Smell
entries: The tikbalang has advantage on Wisdom ({@skill Perception}) checks that rely on smell.

trait.name: Magic Resistance
entries: The sarimanok has advantage on saving throws against spells and other magical effects.

trait.name: Mimicry
entries: The tikbalang can mimic animal sounds and humanoid voices. A creature that hears the sounds can tell they are imitations with a successful {@dc 14} Wisdom ({@skill Insight}) check.

action.name: Multiattack
entries: The tikbalang makes three attacks: one Bite attack or Kick attack and two Claw attacks, or three Mane Spine attacks.

action.name: Bite
entries: {@atk mw} {@hit 5} to hit, reach 5 ft., one creature. {@h}7 ({@damage 1d8 + 3}) piercing damage. If the target is a creature, it must succeed on a {@dc 12} Constitution saving throw against disease or become {@condition poisoned} until the disease is cured. Every 24 hours that elapse, the creature must repeat the saving throw, reducing its hit point maximum by 5 ({@damage 1d10}) on a failure. This reduction lasts until the disease is cured. The creature dies if the disease reduces its hit point maximum to 0.

action.name: Claw
entries: {@atk mw} {@hit 5} to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. {@h}7 ({@damage 1d8 + 3}) slashing damage.

action.name: Kick
entries: {@atk mw} {@hit 5} to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. {@h}8 ({@damage 1d10 + 3}) bludgeoning damage and if the target is a Medium or smaller creature, it must succeed on a {@dc 13} Strength saving throw or be knocked {@condition prone}.

action.name: Mane Spine
entries: {@atk rw} {@hit 5} to hit, range 20/60 ft., one target. {@h}6 ({@damage 1d6 + 3}) piercing damage and the target is {@condition poisoned} for 1 minute or until one spends an action to remove the spine.

action.name: Illusory Appearance
entries: The tikbalang covers itself and anything it is wearing or carrying with a magical illusion that makes it look like another creature of Large size or smaller. The illusion ends if the tikbalang takes a bonus action to end it or if it dies.

The changes wrought by this effect fail to hold up to physical inspection. For example, the tikbalang could appear to have a regular humanoid face, but someone touching its face would feel its equine-shaped snout. Otherwise, a creature must take an action to visually inspect the illusion and succeed on a {@dc 20} Intelligence ({@skill Investigation}) check to discern that the tikbalang is disguised.

reaction.name: Rear Kick
entries: When a creature the tikbalang can see moves within 5 feet of it, the tikbalang can make one Kick attack against the creature.

spellcasting.name: Innate Spellcasting
headerEntries: The tikbalang casts one of the following spells, requiring no material components and using Charisma as the spellcasting ability (spell save {@dc 13}):

trait.name: Blind Senses
entries: The tigbanua can't use its {@sense blindsight} while {@condition deafened} and unable to smell.

trait.name: Fear Aura
entries: Any creature hostile to the tigbanua that starts its turn within 10 feet of the tigbanua must make a {@dc 12} Wisdom saving throw, unless the tigbanua is {@condition incapacitated}. On a failed save, the creature is {@condition frightened} until the start of its next turn. If a creature's saving throw is successful, the creature is immune to the tigbanua's Fear Aura for the next 24 hours.

trait.name: Keen Hearing And Smell
entries: The tigbanua has advantage on Wisdom ({@skill Perception}) checks that rely on hearing or smell.

trait.name: Pack Tactics
entries: The tigbanua has advantage on an attack roll against a creature if at least one of the tigbanua's allies is within 5 feet of the creature and the ally isn't {@condition incapacitated}.

action.name: Multiattack
entries: The tigbanua makes two attacks: one with its Bite and one with its Claws.

action.name: Bite
entries: {@atk mw} {@hit 5} to hit, reach 5 ft., one creature. {@h}6 ({@damage 1d6 + 3}) piercing damage and if the target is a humanoid, it must succeed on a {@dc 11} Constitution saving throw or become afflicted by the {@creature buso|MonsterManualExpanded3} aswang curse. Casting {@spell remove curse}, {@spell greater restoration}, or a similar spell on the target before the transformation is complete can end the curse. Doing so undoes the changes made to the target by the curse.

action.name: Claws
entries: {@atk mw} {@hit 5} to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. {@h}10 ({@damage 2d6 + 3}) slashing damage

entries: If the thug gang boss a saving throw, it can choose to succeed instead.

trait.name: Pack Tactics
entries: The thug gang boss has advantage on an attack roll against a creature if at least one of the thug gang boss's allies is within 5 feet of the creature and the ally isn't {@condition incapacitated}.

action.name: Multiattack
entries: The thug gang boss uses Maneuver Allies, if available. It then makes two melee attacks.

action.name: Great Mace
entries: {@atk mw} {@hit 7} to hit, reach 5 ft., one creature. {@h}11 ({@damage 2d6 + 4}) bludgeoning damage.

action.name: Heavy Crossbow
entries: {@atk rw} {@hit 4} to hit, range 100/400 ft., one target. {@h}6 ({@damage 1d10 + 1}) piercing damage.

action.name: Maneuver Allies {@recharge 5}
entries: Up to four allies within 60 feet of this thug gang boss that can hear it can each use their reaction to move up to half their speed without provoking {@action opportunity attack|PHB|opportunity attacks}.

bonus.name: Battle Command
entries: The thug gang boss one ally it can see within 30 feet of it. If the target can see or hear the thug gang boss, the target can use its reaction to make one melee attack or to take the {@action Dodge} or {@action Hide} action.

reaction.name: Redirect Attack
entries: When a creature the thug gang boss can see targets it with an attack, the thug gang boss chooses an ally within 5 feet of it. The thug gang boss swaps places with the chosen ally, and the chosen ally becomes the target instead.

legendary.name: Move
entries: The thug gang boss moves up to half its speed without provoking {@action opportunity attack|PHB|opportunity attacks}.

legendary.name: Cheap Shot
entries: Melee Weapon {@action Attack}: {@hit 7} to hit, reach 5 ft., one creature. Hit: The target must succeed on a {@dc 15} Constitution saving throw or be {@condition stunned} until the end of its next turn.

legendary.name: Attack (Costs 2 Actions)
entries: The thug gang boss makes a melee or ranged weapon attack.

trait.name: Pack Tactics
entries: The thug captain has advantage on an attack roll against a creature if at least one of the thug captain's allies is within 5 feet of the creature and the ally isn't {@condition incapacitated}.

action.name: Multiattack
entries: The thug captain uses Maneuver Allies, if available. It then makes two melee attacks.

action.name: Mace
entries: {@atk mw} {@hit 5} to hit, reach 5 ft., one creature. {@h}6 ({@damage 1d6 + 3}) bludgeoning damage.

action.name: Heavy Crossbow
entries: {@atk rw} {@hit 3} to hit, range 100/400 ft., one target. {@h}6 ({@damage 1d10 + 1}) piercing damage.

action.name: Maneuver Allies {@recharge 5}
entries: Up to three allies within 60 feet of this thug captain that can hear it can each use their reaction to move up to half their speed without provoking {@action opportunity attack|PHB|opportunity attacks}.

entries: The thug captain targets one ally it can see within 30 feet of it. If the target can see or hear the thug captain, the target can use its reaction to make one melee attack or to take the {@action Dodge} or {@action Hide} action.

trait.name: Aura of Menace
entries: The archon emanates an aura of menace in a 30-foot radius. The first time any enemy creature enters the aura or starts its turn there during a battle, the creature must succeed on a {@dc 18} Wisdom saving throw or become {@condition frightened} of the archon for 1 minute or until it takes any damage.

trait.name: Improved Critical
entries: The archon's weapon attacks score a critical hit on a roll of 19 or 20.

trait.name: Penitentiary Gaze
entries: Provided the archon isn't {@condition incapacitated}, if a non-lawful good creature starts its turn within 30 feet of the archon and the two of them can see each other, the archon can force the creature to make a {@dc 18} Wisdom saving throw if the archon isn't {@condition incapacitated}. On a failed save, the creature becomes wracked with guilt and filled with remorse over its life's actions that weren't lawful or good, and suffers an effect depending on its alignment.

LN or NG. The target suffers the effect of the {@spell confusion} spell without making a saving throw. The effect lasts until the end of its next turn. The archon doesn't need to concentrate on the spell.
CG, CN or N. Gain 1 level of {@condition exhaustion}.
CE, NE, or LE. Gain 1 level of {@condition exhaustion} and take 5 ({@damage 1d10}) psychic damage and 5 ({@damage 1d10}) radiant damage.

A creature that isn't surprised can avert its eyes to avoid the saving throw at the start of its turn. If it does so, it can't see the archon until the start of its next turn, when it can avert its eyes again.

If it looks at the archon in the meantime, it must immediately make the save. If a creature's saving throw is successful, the creature is immune to the archon's Penitentiary Gaze for the next 24 hours.

trait.name: Magic Resistance
entries: Архонт имеет преимущество в бросках спасения против заклинаний и других магических эффектов.

action.name: Multiattack
entries: he archon makes three Greatsword attacks, or makes one Greatsword attack and casts one spell that takes 1 action to cast.

action.name: Greatsword
entries: {@atk mw} +11 to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. {@h}20 ({@damage 4d6 + 6}) slashing damage plus 13 ({@damage 3d8}) radiant damage.

action.name: Teleport
entries: The archon magically teleports, along with any equipment it is wearing or carrying and any creatures it has grappled, up to 60 feet to an unoccupied space it can see.

trait.name: Inscrutable
entries: The sphinx is immune to any effect that would sense its emotions or read its thoughts, as well as any divination spell that it refuses. Wisdom ({@skill Insight}) checks made to ascertain the sphinx's intentions or sincerity have disadvantage.

trait.name: Magic Weapons
entries: The sphinx's weapon attacks are magical.

action.name: Multiattack
entries: The sphinx makes two Claw attacks. If both Claw attacks hit the same target, the target takes an extra 9 ({@damage 2d8}) slashing damage.

action.name: Claw
entries: {@atk mw} {@hit 6} to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. {@h}12 ({@damage 2d8 + 3}) slashing damage.

action.name: Suppress Magic {@recharge 5}
entries: The sphinx targets one magic item it can see within 120 feet of it. If the magic item isn't an artifact, its magical properties are suppressed for 10 minutes, until the sphinx is {@condition incapacitated} or dies, or until the sphinx uses a bonus action to end the effect.

entries: The dragon has advantage on Wisdom ({@skill Perception}) checks and on saving throws against being {@condition blinded}, {@condition charmed}, {@condition deafened}, {@condition frightened}, {@condition stunned}, and knocked {@condition unconscious}. For each head the dragon has beyond one, it gets an extra reaction that can be used only for {@action opportunity attack|PHB|opportunity attacks}.

action.name: Claw

A creature can repeat the saving throw at the end of each of its turns, ending the effect on itself on a success. If a creature's saving throw is successful or the effect ends for it, the creature is immune to the dragon's Frightful Presence for the next 24 hours.

trait.name: Multiple Heads
entries: The thessaltrice has eight cockatrice heads. While it has more than one cockatrice head, the thessaltrice has advantage on saving throws against being {@condition blinded}, charmed, deafened, frightened, stunned, and knocked {@condition unconscious}.
Whenever the thessaltrice takes 3 or more damage in a single turn, one of its cockatrice heads dies.

At the end of its turn, it grows two cockatrice heads for each of its cockatrice heads that died since its last turn, unless it has taken fire or acid damage since its last turn. The thessaltrice regains 3 hit points for each cockatrice head regrown in this way.

trait.name: Wakeful
entries: While the thessaltrice sleeps, at least one of its cockatrice heads is awake.

action.name: Multiattack
entries: The thessaltrice makes three attacks: one with its Flurry of Cockatrice Bites, one with its Maw, and one with its Tail Pincer.

action.name: Flurry of Cockatrice Bites
entries: {@atk mw} {@hit 3} to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. {@h}3 ({@damage 1d4 +1}) piercing damage piercing damage for each cockatrice head it has, and the target must succeed on a {@dc 12} Constitution saving throw against being magically petrified. On a failed save, the creature begins to turn to stone and is {@condition restrained}. It must repeat the saving throw at the end of its next turn. On a success, the effect ends. On a failure, the creature is {@condition petrified} for 24 hours.

action.name: Maw
entries: {@atk mw} {@hit 3} to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. {@h}4 ({@damage 1d6 + 1}) piercing damage and if the target is a creature, it must succeed on a {@dc 12} Constitution saving throw or take 10 ({@damage 3d6}) poison damage. On a successful save, the target takes half as much damage.

Until this grapple ends, the target is {@condition restrained}, and the thessaltrice can't use its Tail Pincer tack on another target.

At the end of its turn, it grows two serpent heads for each of its serpent heads that died since its last turn, unless it has taken fire or acid damage since its last turn. The thessalmera regains 5 hit points for each serpent head regrown in this way.

Whenever the thessalhydra takes 10 or more damage in a single turn, one of its serpent heads dies.

At the end of its turn, it grows two serpent heads for each of its serpent heads that died since its last turn, unless it has taken fire or acid damage since its last turn. The thessalhydra regains 10 hit points for each serpent head regrown in this way.

entries: {@atk mw} {@hit 9} to hit, reach 10 ft., one target. {@h}9 ({@damage 1d8 + 5}) bludgeoning damage and if the target is a Medium or smaller creature, it is also {@condition grappled} (escape {@dc 17}). Until this grapple ends, the target is {@condition restrained}, and the thessalgorgon can't use its Tail Pincer attack on another target.

action.name: Petrifying Breath {@recharge 5}
entries: The thessalgorgon exhales petrifying gas in a 30-foot cone. Each creature in that area must succeed on a {@dc 16} Constitution saving throw. On a failed save, a target begins to turn to stone and is {@condition restrained}. The {@condition restrained} target must repeat the saving throw at the end of its next turn. On a success, the effect ends on the target. On a failure, the target is {@condition petrified} until freed by the {@spell greater restoration} spell or other magic.

trait.name: False Appearance
entries: While the tendriculos remains motionless, it is indistinguishable from a normal mound of vegetation.

trait.name: Regeneration
entries: The tendriculos regains 10 hit points at the start of its turn if it is touching at least 5-feet square of vegetation. This feature consumes the vegetation. If the tendriculos takes acid or fire damage, this trait doesn't function at the start of the tendriculos's next turn.

action.name: Multiattack
entries: The tendriculos makes three melee attacks. two Tendril attacks and one Bite or Swallow.

action.name: Bite
entries: {@atk mw} {@hit 7} to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. {@h}17 ({@damage 3d8 + 4}) piercing damage, and the target must succeed on a {@dc 15} Constitution saving throw or be {@condition poisoned} for 1 minute. Until this poison ends, the creature is {@condition paralyzed}. A creature can repeat the saving throw at the end of each of its turns, ending the effect on itself on a success.

action.name: Tendril
entries: {@atk mw} {@hit 7} to hit, reach 15 ft., one creature. {@h}7 ({@damage 1d6 + 4}) bludgeoning damage and if the target is Large or smaller creature, it is also {@condition grappled} (escape {@dc 14}). Until this grapple ends, the target is {@condition restrained}. The tendriculos has two tendrils, each of which can grapple only one target. Each tendril can be attacked (AC 12; 20 hit points; immunity to poison and psychic damage). Destroying a tendril deals no damage to the tendriculos, which can grow a replacement tendril as an action.

action.name: Swallow
entries: The tendriculos makes one Bite attack against a Large or smaller target it is grappling. If the attack hits, the target is also swallowed, and the grapple ends. While swallowed, the target is {@condition blinded} and {@condition restrained}, it has total cover against attacks and other effects outside the tendriculos, and it takes 10 ({@damage 3d6}) acid damage at the start of each of the tendriculos's turns. A tendriculos can have up to four Small creatures, two Medium, or one Large creature swallowed at a time.

If the tendriculos takes 20 damage or more on a single turn from the swallowed creature, the tendriculos must succeed on a {@dc 14} Constitution saving throw at the end of that turn or regurgitate the creature, which falls {@condition prone} in a space within 10 feet of the tendriculos. If the tendriculos dies, a swallowed creature is no longer {@condition restrained} by it and can escape from the corpse by using 15 feet of movement, exiting {@condition prone}.

action.name: Poison Breath {@recharge 5}
entries: The tendriculos exhales poisonous splinters in a 30-foot cone. Each creature in the area must succeed on a {@dc 15} Constitution saving throw. On a failed save, a creature takes 22 ({@damage 4d8 + 4}) piercing damage and is {@condition poisoned} for 1 minute. Until this poison ends, the creature is {@condition paralyzed}. A creature can repeat the saving throw at the end of each of its turns, ending the effect on itself on a success. On a successful save, a creature takes half as much damage and isn't {@condition poisoned}.

trait.name: Battle Concentration
entries: The templar has advantage on Constitution saving throws that it makes to maintain concentration on a spell when it takes damage.

trait.name: Legendary Resistance (3/Day)
entries: If the grand templar fails a saving throw, it can choose to succeed instead.

trait.name: Spell Penetration
entries: When the grand templar casts a spell and is interrupted by an enemy's {@spell counterspell}, treat the spell's level as 3 levels higher.

action.name: Multiattack
entries: The grand templar makes two melee attacks, or makes one melee attack and casts one spell that takes 1 action to cast.

action.name: Heavy Mace
entries: {@atk mw} {@hit 8} to hit, reach 5 ft., one creature. {@h}7 ({@damage 1d8 + 3}) bludgeoning damage or 8 ({@damage 1d10 + 3}) bludgeoning damage if used with two hands, plus 4 ({@damage 1d8}) radiant (good) or 4 ({@damage 1d8}) necrotic (evil) damage.

spellcasting.name: Innate Spellcasting
headerEntries: The grand templar casts one of the following spells using Wisdom as the spellcasting ability (spell save {@dc 16}, {@hit 8} to hit with spell attacks):
footerEntries: {@i *The grand templar casts this spell on itself before combat.}

legendary.name: Move
entries: The grand templar moves up to half its speed.

legendary.name: Attack
entries: The grand templar makes a melee weapon attack.

legendary.name: Cantrip
entries: The grand templar casts {@spell sacred flame}, {@spell toll the dead|XGE}, or {@spell word of radiance|XGE}.

legendary.name: Cast a Spell (Costs 2 Actions)
entries: The grand templar uses Spellcasting.

trait.name: Battle Concentration
entries: The templar has advantage on Constitution saving throws that it makes to maintain concentration on a spell when it takes damage.

action.name: Multiattack
entries: The templar makes two melee attacks, or makes one melee attack and casts one spell that takes 1 action to cast.

action.name: Heavy Mace
entries: {@atk mw} {@hit 5} to hit, reach 5 ft., one creature. {@h}7 ({@damage 1d8 + 3}) bludgeoning damage or 8 ({@damage 1d10 + 3}) bludgeoning damage if used with two hands.

spellcasting.name: Innate Spellcasting
headerEntries: The templar casts one of the following spells using Wisdom as the spellcasting ability (spell save {@dc 12}, {@hit 4} to hit with spell attacks):

trait.name: Charge
entries: If the sphinx moves at least 20 feet straight toward a creature and then hits it with a Gore attack on the same turn, the target takes an extra 11 ({@damage 2d10}) piercing damage.

trait.name: Inscrutable
entries: The sphinx is immune to any effect that would sense its emotions or read its thoughts, as well as any divination spell that it refuses. Wisdom ({@skill Insight}) checks made to ascertain the sphinx's intentions or sincerity have disadvantage.

trait.name: Reckless
entries: At the start of its turn, the sphinx can gain advantage on all melee weapon attack rolls it makes during that turn, but attack rolls against it have advantage until the start of its next turn.

trait.name: Magic Weapons
entries: The sphinx's weapon attacks are magical.

action.name: Multiattack
entries: The sphinx makes three attacks: one Gore attack and two Claw attacks. If both Claw attacks hit the same target, the target takes an extra 4 ({@damage 1d8}) slashing damage.

action.name: Gore
entries: {@atk mw} {@hit 8} to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. {@h}16 ({@damage 2d10 + 5}) piercing damage.

action.name: Claws
entries: {@atk mw} {@hit 8} to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. {@h}9 ({@damage 1d8 + 5}) slashing damage.

action.name: Bellow (2/Day)
entries: The sphinx emits a magical bellow. Each time it bellows before finishing a long rest, the bellow is louder and the effect is different, as detailed below. Each creature within 60 feet of the sphinx and able to hear the bellow must make a saving throw.

action.name: First Bellow
entries: Each creature that fails a {@dc 14} Constitution saving throw is {@condition deafened} for 1 minute. A {@condition deafened} creature can repeat the saving throw at the end of each of its turns, ending the effect on itself on a success.

action.name: Second Bellow
entries: Each creature that fails a {@dc 14} Constitution saving throw is {@condition deafened} for 1 minute. A {@condition deafened} creature is {@condition stunned} and can repeat the saving throw at the end of each of its turns, ending the effect on itself on a success.

legendary.name: Claw Attack
entries: The sphinx makes one Claw attack.

legendary.name: Teleport (Costs 2 Actions)
entries: The sphinx magically teleports, along with any equipment it is wearing or carrying, up to 60 feet to an unoccupied space it can see.

legendary.name: Raking Pounce (Costs 3 Actions)
entries: The sphinx moves up to its speed and makes two Claw attacks. If both Claw attacks hit the same target, the target takes an extra 4 ({@damage 1d8}) slashing damage.

trait.name: Aura of Menace
entries: The archon emanates an aura of menace in a 30-foot radius. The first time any enemy creature enters the aura or starts its turn there during a battle, the creature must succeed on a {@dc 16} Wisdom saving throw or become {@condition frightened} of the archon for 1 minute or until it takes any damage.

trait.name: Flyby
entries: The archon doesn't provoke {@action opportunity attack|PHB|opportunity attacks} when it flies out of an enemy's reach.

trait.name: Magic Resistance
entries: Архонт имеет преимущество в бросках спасения против заклинаний и других магических эффектов.

trait.name: Discorporating Dive (3/Day)
entries: If the archon is flying and dives at least 30 feet straight toward a target and then hits it with an armblade attack, the archon can force the target to make a {@dc 17} Constitution saving throw. On a failed save, the creature takes 22 ({@damage 5d8}) radiant damage and 22 ({@damage 5d8}) fire damage and the target is disintegrated if this damage leaves it with 0 hit points. A disintegrated creature and everything it is wearing and carrying, except magic items, are reduced to a pile of fine gray dust. In addition, a disintegrated humanoid's soul is sent to a prison in the Seven Heavens of Celestia. Until its soul is released or a wish spell is used, the creature cannot be restored to life. On a successful save, the creature takes half as much damage.

action.name: Multiattack
entries: The archon makes two Armblade attacks.

action.name: Armblade
entries: {@atk mw} {@hit 9} to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. {@h}12 ({@damage 2d6 + 5}) slashing damage plus 4 ({@damage 1d8}) radiant damage and 4 ({@damage 1d8}) fire damage.

action.name: Teleport
entries: The archon magically teleports, along with any equipment it is wearing or carrying and any creatures it has grappled, up to 60 feet to an unoccupied space it can see.

bonus.name: Armblades
entries: The archon transforms the flesh of its forearms, hardening and sharpening them into the form of divine, fiery swordblades, or vice versa. The archon's armblade attacks are considered magical.

spellcasting.name: Innate Spellcasting
headerEntries: The sword archon's innate spellcasting ability is Charisma (spell save {@dc 16}). It can innately cast the following spells, requiring no material components:

trait.name: Fearsome Presence
entries: Any non-eladrin creature that starts its turn within 30 feet of the eladrin must make a {@dc 13} Wisdom saving throw. On a failed save, the creature becomes {@condition frightened} of the eladrin for 1 minute. A creature can repeat the saving throw at the end of each of its turns, ending the effect on itself on a success. If a creature's saving throw is successful or the effect ends for it, the creature is immune to any eladrin's Fearsome Presence for the next 24 hours.

trait.name: Magic Resistance
entries: Эладрин имеет преимущество в бросках спасения против заклинаний и других магических эффектов.

action.name: Multiattack
entries: The eladrin makes two weapon attacks.

action.name: Longsword
entries: {@atk mw} {@hit 5} to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. {@h}7 ({@damage 1d8 + 3}) slashing damage, or 8 ({@damage 1d10 + 3}) slashing damage if used with two hands, plus 2 ({@damage 1d4}) fire damage.

action.name: Longbow
entries: {@atk rw} {@hit 6} to hit, range 150/600 ft., one target. {@h}8 ({@damage 1d8 + 4}) piercing damage plus 2 ({@damage 1d4}) fire damage.

bonus.name: Fey Step {@recharge 4}
entries: Эладрин телепортируется на расстояние до 30 футов в незанятое пространство, которое он может видеть.

reaction.name: Parry
entries: The eladrin adds 2 to its AC against one melee attack that would hit it. To do so, the eladrin must see the attacker and be wielding a melee weapon.

monster.name: Summer Eladrin, Elder

trait.name: Fearsome Presence
entries: Any non-eladrin creature that starts its turn within 60 feet of the eladrin must make a {@dc 18} Wisdom saving throw. On a failed save, the creature becomes {@condition frightened} of the eladrin for 1 minute. A creature can repeat the saving throw at the end of each of its turns, ending the effect on itself on a success. If a creature's saving throw is successful or the effect ends for it, the creature is immune to any eladrin's Fearsome Presence for the next 24 hours.

trait.name: Magic Resistance
entries: Эладрин имеет преимущество в бросках спасения против заклинаний и других магических эффектов.

trait.name: Spell Penetration
entries: Когда эладрин произносит заклинание и его прерывает враг {@spell counterspell}, считайте уровень заклинания на 3 уровня выше.

entries: The eladrin makes two weapon attacks.

action.name: Longsword
entries: {@atk mw} +10 to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. {@h}14 ({@damage 2d8 + 5}) slashing damage, or 15 ({@damage 2d10 + 5}) slashing damage if used with two hands, plus 9 ({@damage 2d8}) fire damage.

action.name: Longbow
entries: {@atk rw} +11 to hit, range 150/600 ft., one target. {@h}15 ({@damage 2d8 + 6}) piercing damage plus 9 ({@damage 2d8}) fire damage.

action.name: Fiery Smite (3/Day)
entries: As a bonus action when the eladrin hits a creature with a weapon attack, it deals an extra 13 ({@damage 3d8}) fire damage and the target has disadvantage to being frightened until the end of the eladrin's next turn.

bonus.name: Fey Step {@recharge 4}
entries: Эладрин телепортируется на расстояние до 30 футов в незанятое пространство, которое он может видеть.

reaction.name: Parry
entries: The eladrin adds 4 to its AC against one melee attack that would hit it. To do so, the eladrin must see the attacker and be wielding a melee weapon.

spellcasting.name: Innate Spellcasting
headerEntries: The eladrin casts one of the following spells, requiring no material components and using Charisma as the spellcasting ability (spell save {@dc 18}):

legendaryHeader: The eladrin gains 3 legendary actions, choosing from the options below. Only one legendary action option can be used at a time and only at the end of another creature's turn. The eladrin regains spent legendary actions at the start of its turn.

legendary.name: Move
entries: Эладрин перемещается на половину своей скорости без провокации {@action opportunity attack|PHB|opportunity attacks}.

legendary.name: Wrathful Glare
entries: The eladrin targets one frightened creature it can see within 30 feet of it. The target must make a {@dc 18} Wisdom saving throw. On a failure, the target is {@condition paralyzed} until the eladrin deals damage to it, or until the end of the eladrin's next turn.

legendary.name: Attack (Costs 2 Actions)
entries: The eladrin makes a weapon attack.

trait.name: Amphibious
entries: The giant can breathe air and water.

trait.name: Legendary Resistance (3/Day)
entries: If the giant fails a saving throw, it can choose to succeed instead.

trait.name: Magic Weapons
entries: The giant's weapon attacks are magical.

action.name: Multiattack
entries: The giant makes two Greatsword attacks.

action.name: Greatsword
entries: {@atk mw} +15 to hit, reach 10 ft., one target. {@h}30 ({@damage 6d6 + 9}) slashing damage plus 4 ({@damage 1d8}) lightning damage.

action.name: Rock
entries: {@atk rw} +15 to hit, range 60/240 ft., one target. {@h}35 ({@damage 4d12 + 9}) bludgeoning damage plus 14 ({@damage 4d6}) thunder damage.

action.name: Lightning Storm {@recharge 5}
entries: A storm cloud instantly appears in the shape of a cylinder that is 10 feet tall with a 120-foot radius, centered on and directly above the giant. The giant chooses up to three points it can see under the cloud. A bolt of lightning flashes down from the cloud to each point. Each creature within 5 feet of that point must make a {@dc 19} Dexterity saving throw. A creature takes 27 ({@damage 6d8}) lightning damage on a failed save, or half as much damage on a successful one. A creature in the area of more than one lightning bolt strike is affected only once. If a creature fails its saving throw by 5 or more, it is also {@condition incapacitated} until the end of its next turn. The storm cloud dissipates at the end of the turn.

spellcasting.name: Innate Spellcasting
headerEntries: The giant casts one of the following spells, requiring no material components and using Charisma as the spellcasting ability (spell save {@dc 19}):

legendary.name: Thunder Step
entries: The giant casts thunder step.

legendary.name: Attack (Costs 2 Actions)
entries: The giant makes a melee or ranged attack.

legendary.name: Thunderbolt (Costs 2 Actions)
entries: The giant hurls a thunderbolt at a creature it can see within 600 feet of it. The target must make a {@dc 19} Dexterity saving throw, taking 13 ({@damage 3d8}) lightning damage and 13 ({@damage 3d8}) thunder damage on a failed save, or half as much damage on a successful one. If a creature fails its saving throw by 5 or more, it is also {@condition incapacitated} until the end of its next turn.

trait.name: Stone Camouflage
entries: The giant has advantage on Dexterity ({@skill Stealth}) checks made to hide in rocky terrain.

action.name: Multiattack
entries: The giant makes two Quarterstaff attacks.

action.name: Quarterstaff
entries: {@atk mw} {@hit 9} to hit, reach 10 ft., one target. {@h}15 ({@damage 3d6 + 5}) bludgeoning damage, or 18 ({@damage 3d8 + 5}) bludgeoning damage if used with two hands.

action.name: Rock
entries: {@atk rw} {@hit 9} to hit, range 60/240 ft., one target. {@h}27 ({@damage 4d10 + 5}) bludgeoning damage. If the target is a creature, it must succeed on a {@dc 17} Strength saving throw or be knocked {@condition prone}.

action.name: Summon Earth Elemental (1/Day)
entries: The giant summons {@dice 1d4} Medium Earth elementals (MME page 91) or 1 Large Earth Elemental. The elementals appear in unoccupied spaces within 30 feet of the giant and act as its ally. The elementals act right after the giant on the same initiative count and fight until they are destroyed. They remain for 1 hour, until they or the giant dies, or until the giant dismisses them as an action.

reaction.name: Rock Catching
entries: If a rock or similar object is hurled at the giant, the giant can, with a successful {@dc 10} Dexterity saving throw, catch the missile and take no bludgeoning damage from it.

reaction.name: Unyielding
entries: When the giant is subjected to an effect that would move it, knock it prone, or both, it can use its reaction to be neither moved nor knocked {@condition prone}.

spellcasting.name: Innate Spellcasting

trait.name: Stone Camouflage
entries: The giant has advantage on Dexterity ({@skill Stealth}) checks made to hide in rocky terrain.

action.name: Multiattack
entries: The giant makes two Spear attacks.

action.name: Spear
entries: {@atk mw,rw} {@hit 7} to hit, reach 10 ft. or range 40/120 ft., one target. {@h}14 ({@damage 3d6 + 4}) piercing damage, or 17 ({@damage 3d8 + 4}) piercing damage if used with two hands to make a melee attack.

action.name: Earthsing (Recharges after a Short or Long Rest)
entries: The giant performs a magical song or tune and targets a 10-foot square section of earth it can see within 60 feet of it. The ability functions like a move earth spell but only affects a 10-foot square area and lasts for 1 minute.

Alternatively, the giant can choose to animate the 10-foot square section of earth, transforming it into a Large humanoid form not unlike an {@creature earth elemental}. For the purposes of combat, the animated earth has the same stats of an earth elemental. It moves up to 30 feet, and makes one slam attack at one creature of the giant's choice within 5 feet of the animated earth.

The giant can use a bonus action to cause it to move 30 feet to another spot within 60 feet of it. As part of the same bonus action, it can cause the animated earth to make one slam attack at one creature within 5 feet of it.
The giant can use its reaction to make the animated earth perform {@action opportunity attack|PHB|opportunity attacks}.
The animated earth remains for 1 minute, until the giant dies or until it dismisses it as an action.

reaction.name: Rock Catching
entries: If a rock or similar object is hurled at the giant, the giant can, with a successful {@dc 10} Dexterity saving throw, catch the missile and take no bludgeoning damage from it.

legendary.name: Earth Stomp
entries: The giant stomps the ground, creating an earth tremor that extends in a 15-foot radius. Other creatures standing on the ground in that area must succeed on a {@dc 19} Dexterity saving throw or be knocked {@condition prone}.

legendary.name: Greatclub (Costs 2 Actions)
entries: The giant attacks with its Greatclub.

On a failed save, the creature becomes {@condition charmed} by the eladrin for 1 minute. On a successful save, the creature becomes immune to any eladrin's Joyful Presence for 24 hours.
Whenever the eladrin deals damage to the {@condition charmed} creature, it can repeat the saving throw, ending the effect on itself on a success.

reaction.name: Instinctive Charm (3/Day)
entries: The eladrin tries to magically divert an attack made against it, provided that the attacker is within 30 feet of it and visible to it. The eladrin must decide to do so before the attack hits or misses. The attacker must make a {@dc 18} Wisdom saving throw. On a failed save, the attacker targets the creature closest to it, other than eladrin or itself. If multiple creatures are closest, the attacker chooses which one to target.

legendaryHeader: The eladrin gains 3 legendary actions, choosing from the options below. Only one legendary action option can be used at a time and only at the end of another creature's turn. The eladrin regains spent legendary actions at the start of its turn.

legendary.name: Move
entries: Эладрин перемещается на половину своей скорости без провокации {@action opportunity attack|PHB|opportunity attacks}.

legendary.name: Captivate
entries: The eladrin casts charm person or Tasha's hideous laughter.

legendary.name: Attack
entries: The eladrin makes a weapon attack.

monster.name: Spiderstone Golem

immune.note: from nonmagical attacks that aren't adamantine

languages: understands the languages of its creator but can't speak

trait.name: Berserk
entries: Whenever the golem starts its turn with 70 hit points or fewer, roll a {@dice d6}. On a 6, the golem goes berserk. On each of its turns while berserk, the golem attacks the nearest creature it can see. If no creature is near enough to move to and attack, the golem attacks an object, with preference for an object smaller than itself. Once the golem goes berserk, it continues to do so until it is destroyed or regains all its hit points.

trait.name: Immutable Form
entries: Голем невосприимчив к любому заклинанию или эффекту, который изменит его форму.

trait.name: Magic Resistance
entries: Голем имеет преимущество в бросках спасения против заклинаний и других магических эффектов.

trait.name: Magic Weapons
entries: Оружейные атаки голема являются магическими.

trait.name: Spider Climb
entries: The golem can climb difficult surfaces, including upside down on ceilings, without needing to make an ability check.

trait.name: Web Sense
entries: While in contact with a web, the golem knows the exact location of any creature in contact with the same web.

trait.name: Web Walker
entries: The golem ignores movement restrictions caused by webbing.

action.name: Multiattack
entries: The golem makes four Scimitar attacks.

action.name: Scimitar
entries: {@atk mw} +10 to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. {@h}12 ({@damage 2d6 + 5}) slashing damage.

action.name: Web Breath {@recharge 5}
entries: The golem exhales poisonous webbing in a 15-foot cone. Each creature in the area must succeed on a {@dc 17} Dexterity saving throw or take 31 ({@damage 7d8}) poison damage and be {@condition restrained} by webbing. A creature that starts its turn restrained takes 9 ({@damage 2d8}) poison damage. As an action, the {@condition restrained} creature can make a {@dc 17} Strength check, escaping from the webbing on a success. The effect ends if the webbing is destroyed. The webbing has AC 10, 10 hit points, vulnerability to fire damage and immunity to bludgeoning, poison, and psychic damage.

trait.name: Smoke Form
entries: The paraelemental can enter a hostile creature's space and stop there. It can move through a space as narrow as 1 inch wide without squeezing.

trait.name: Heated Weapons
entries: When the paraelemental hits with a metal melee weapon, it deals an extra 3 ({@damage 1d6}) fire damage (included in the attack).

action.name: Multiattack
entries: The paraelemental makes two Claw attacks.

action.name: Claw
entries: {@atk mw} {@hit 7} to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. {@h}13 ({@damage 2d8 + 4}) slashing damage plus 3 ({@damage 1d6}) fire damage.

action.name: Suffocate {@recharge 5}
entries: The paraelemental fills the lungs of its victims with smoke. Each creature in the paraelemental's space must make a {@dc 13} Constitution saving throw. On a failure, the target takes 13 ({@damage 2d8 + 4}) bludgeoning damage plus 3 ({@damage 1d6}) fire damage and begins to choke and suffocate. A suffocating creature is {@condition incapacitated} and can survive a number of rounds equal to its Constitution modifier. When a creature runs out of breath, it drops to 0 hit points and is dying at the start of its next turn, and can't regain hit points or be stabilized until it can breathe again. On a successful save, the target takes half as much damage and doesn't suffocate.

trait.name: Electricity Sense
entries: The shocker lizard can detect an electrical discharge within 240 feet of it.

action.name: Multiattack
entries: The shocker lizard makes three attacks: one with its Bite, one with its Claws, and one with its Tail.

action.name: Bite
entries: {@atk mw} {@hit 7} to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. {@h}13 ({@damage 2d8 + 4}) piercing damage plus 14 ({@damage 4d6}) lightning damage.

action.name: Claws
entries: {@atk mw} {@hit 7} to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. {@h}13 ({@damage 2d8 + 4}) slashing damage.

action.name: Tail
entries: {@atk mw} {@hit 7} to hit, reach 15 ft., one target. {@h}12 ({@damage 2d6 + 5}) bludgeoning damage and if the target must succeed on a {@dc 15} Strength saving throw or be knocked {@condition prone}.

action.name: Lightning Shock {@recharge 5}
entries: The shocker lizard discharges electricity in a 30-foot-radius sphere centered on itself. Each creature in that area must make a {@dc 15} Constitution saving throw, taking 21 ({@damage 6d6}) lightning damage on a failed save, or half as much damage on a successful one. If the creature fails its saving throw by 5 or more, it is also {@condition incapacitated} until the end of its next turn.

reaction.name: Chain Lightning Shock
entries: If a creature within 15 feet of the shocker lizard uses Lightning Shock, the shocker lizard uses its Lightning Shock, if available.

trait.name: Electricity Sense
entries: The shocker lizard can detect an electrical discharge within 120 feet of it.

action.name: Multiattack
entries: The shocker lizard makes two attacks: one with its Bite and one with its Claws.

action.name: Bite
entries: {@atk mw} {@hit 5} to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. {@h}10 ({@damage 2d6 + 3}) piercing damage plus 10 ({@damage 3d6}) lightning damage.

action.name: Claws
entries: {@atk mw} {@hit 5} to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. {@h}10 ({@damage 2d6 + 3}) slashing damage.

action.name: Lightning Shock {@recharge 5}
entries: The shocker lizard discharges electricity in a 20-foot-radius sphere centered on itself. Each creature in that area must make a {@dc 13} Constitution saving throw, taking 14 ({@damage 4d6}) lightning damage on a failed save, or half as much damage on a successful one. If the creature fails its saving throw by 5 or more, it is also {@condition incapacitated} until the end of its next turn.

reaction.name: Chain Lightning Shock
entries: If a creature within 15 feet of the shocker lizard uses Lightning Shock, the shocker lizard uses its Lightning Shock, if available.

trait.name: Electricity Sense
entries: The shocker lizard can detect an electrical discharge within 60 feet of it.

action.name: Bite
entries: {@atk mw} {@hit 4} to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. {@h}4 ({@damage 1d4 + 2}) piercing damage plus 3 ({@damage 1d6}) lightning damage.

action.name: Lightning Shock {@recharge 5}
entries: The shocker lizard discharges electricity in a 10-foot-radius sphere centered on itself. Each creature in that area must make a {@dc 10} Constitution saving throw, taking 7 ({@damage 2d6}) lightning damage on a failed save, or half as much damage on a successful one. If the creature fails its saving throw by 5 or more, it is also {@condition incapacitated} until the end of its next turn.

reaction.name: Chain Lightning Shock
entries: If a creature within 15 feet of the shocker lizard uses Lightning Shock, the shocker lizard uses its Lightning Shock, if available.

trait.name: Electricity Sense
entries: The shocker lizard can detect an electrical discharge within 120 feet of it.

action.name: Bite
entries: {@atk mw} {@hit 4} to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. {@h}5 ({@damage 1d6 + 2}) piercing damage plus 7 ({@damage 2d6}) lightning damage.

action.name: Lightning Shock {@recharge 5}
entries: The shocker lizard discharges electricity in a 15-foot-radius sphere centered on itself. Each creature in that area must make a {@dc 11} Constitution saving throw, taking 10 ({@damage 3d6}) lightning damage on a failed save, or half as much damage on a successful one. If the creature fails its saving throw by 5 or more, it is also {@condition incapacitated} until the end of its next turn.

reaction.name: Chain Lightning Shock
entries: If a creature within 15 feet of the shocker lizard uses Lightning Shock, the shocker lizard uses its Lightning Shock, if available.

trait.name: Rational Mind
entries: The shedu has advantage on Intelligence and Wisdom saving throws.

trait.name: Sure-footed
entries: The shedu has advantage on Strength and Dexterity saving throws made against effects that would knock it prone.

action.name: Multiattack
entries: The shedu makes two Hoof attacks.

action.name: Hoof
entries: {@atk mw} {@hit 9} to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. {@h}14 ({@damage 2d8 + 5}) bludgeoning damage plus 7 ({@damage 2d6}) psychic damage.

action.name: Etherealness
entries: The shedu magically enters the Ethereal Plane from the Material Plane, or vice versa.

action.name: Trample {@recharge 5}
entries: he shedu moves up to its speed in a straight line. During this move, it can enter Medium or smaller creatures' spaces. A creature whose space the shedu enters must succeed on a {@dc 16} Dexterity saving throw. On a successful save, the creature is pushed 5 feet to the nearest space out of the shedu's path. On a failed save, the creature falls {@condition prone} and takes 23 ({@damage 4d8 + 5}) bludgeoning damage plus 14 ({@damage 4d6}) psychic damage. If the shedu remains in the prone creature's space, the creature is also {@condition restrained} until it's no longer in the same space as the shedu. While {@condition restrained} in this way, the creature, or another creature within 5 feet of it, can make a {@dc 17} Strength check. On a success, the creature is shunted to an unoccupied space of its choice within 5 feet of the shedu and is no longer {@condition restrained}.

action.name: Mind Hammer (3/Day)
entries: The shedu targets a creature it can see within 60 feet of it and psychically slams the creature's mind. The target must succeed on a {@dc 17} Wisdom saving throw or take 32 ({@damage 7d8}) psychic damage and be {@condition stunned} for 1 minute. A creature can repeat the saving throw at the end of each of its turns, ending the effect on itself on a success.

trait.name: Illumination
entries: The sarimanok sheds bright light in a 5-foot radius and dim light for an additional 5 feet.

trait.name: Magic Resistance
entries: The sarimanok has advantage on saving throws against spells and other magical effects.

trait.name: Magic Weapons
entries: The sarimanok's weapon attacks are magical.

action.name: Multiattack
entries: The sarimanok makes three attacks. one with its Beak, one with its Talons, and one with its Prismatic Tail.

action.name: Beak
entries: {@atk mw} {@hit 7} to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. {@h}12 ({@damage 2d8 + 3}) piercing damage.

action.name: Talons
entries: {@atk mw} {@hit 7} to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. {@h}21 ({@damage 4d8 + 3}) slashing damage.

action.name: Prismatic Tail
entries: {@atk mw} {@hit 7} to hit, reach 15 ft., one target. {@h}Roll a {@dice d8} to determine which color tail affects the target.

items.name: 1. Red.
items.entry: 35 ({@damage 10d6}) fire damage.

items.name: 2. Orange.
items.entry: 35 ({@damage 10d6}) acid damage.

items.name: 3. Yellow.
items.entry: 35 ({@damage 10d6}) lightning damage.

items.name: 4. Green.
items.entry: 35 ({@damage 10d6}) poison damage.

items.name: 5. Blue.
items.entry: 35 ({@damage 10d6}) cold damage.

items.name: 6. Indigo.
items.entry: The target must make a {@dc 16} Constitution saving throw or become {@condition petrified} for 24 hours. A creature can repeat the saving throw at the end of each of its turns, ending the effect on itself on a success.

items.name: 7. Violet.
items.entry: The target must make {@dc 16} Wisdom saving throw or be transported to another plane of existence of the GM's choosing. (Typically, a creature that is on a plane that isn't its home plane is banished home, while other creatures are usually cast into the Astral or Ethereal planes.) A creature can repeat the saving throw at the end of each of its turns. On a success, the target reappears in the space it left or in the nearest unoccupied space if that space is occupied.

items.name: 8. Special.
items.entry: The target is struck by two tails. Roll twice more, rerolling any 8.

action.name: Sarimanok's Crow (1/Day)
entries: The sarimanok emits a magical crow. Each creature of the sarimanok's choice that is within 120 feet of it, can hear it, and not already affected by Sarimanok's Crow gains 10 temporary hit points and advantage on initiative rolls, becomes immune to being charmed and {@condition frightened}, and can't be put to sleep by magic for 1 minute.
