entries: The dragon beats its wings. Each creature within 10 feet of the dragon must succeed on a {@dc 19} Dexterity saving throw or take 13 ({@damage 2d6 + 6}) bludgeoning damage and be knocked {@condition prone}. The dragon can then fly up to half its flying speed.

trait.name: Legendary Resistance (3/Day)
entries: If the illithidragon fails a saving throw, it can choose to succeed instead.

trait.name: Magic Resistance
entries: Иллитидракон имеет преимущество в бросках спасения против заклинаний и других магических эффектов.

action.name: Multiattack
entries: The illithidragon can use its Frightful Presence. It then makes one Tentacles attack and two Claw attacks. It can use Extract Brain in place of its Tentacles.

action.name: Tentacles
entries: {@atk mw} +11 to hit, reach 15 ft., one creature. {@h}20 ({@damage 4d6 + 6}) bludgeoning damage plus 7 ({@damage 2d6}) psychic damage. If the target is Huge or smaller, it is {@condition grappled} (escape {@dc 19}) and must succeed on a {@dc 18} Intelligence saving throw or be {@condition stunned} until this grapple ends.

action.name: Claw
entries: {@atk mw} +11 к попаданию, досягаемость 5 футов, одна цель. {@h}13 ({@damage 2d6 + 6}) косой урон.

action.name: Tail
entries: {@atk mw} +11 to hit, reach 15 ft., one target. {@h}15 ({@damage 2d8 + 6}) bludgeoning damage.

action.name: Extract Brain
entries: {@atk mw} +11 to hit, reach 5 ft., one incapacitated creature that has a brain grappled by the illithidragon. {@h}The target takes 77 ({@damage 14d10}) piercing damage. If this damage reduces the target to 0 hit points, the illithidragon kills the target by extracting and devouring its brain.

action.name: Frightful Presence
entries: Each creature of the illithidragon's choice that is within 120 feet of the illithidragon and aware of it must succeed on a {@dc 16} Wisdom saving throw or become {@condition frightened} for 1 minute. A creature can repeat the saving throw at the end of each of its turns, ending the effect on itself on a success. If a creature's saving throw is successful or the effect ends for it, the creature is immune to the illithidragon's Frightful Presence for the next 24 hours.

action.name: Mind Blast {@recharge 5}
entries: The illithidragon magically emits psychic energy in a 60-foot cone. Each creature in that area must succeed on a {@dc 18} Intelligence saving throw or take 41 ({@damage 8d8 + 5}) psychic damage and be {@condition stunned} for 1 minute. A creature can repeat the saving throw at the end of each of its turns, ending the effect on itself on a success.

spellcasting.name: Innate Spellcasting
headerEntries: The illithidragon casts one of the following spells, requiring no material components and using Intelligence as the spellcasting ability (spell save {@dc 18}):

legendary.name: Detect
entries: The illithidragon makes a Wisdom ({@skill Perception}) check.

legendary.name: Tail Attack
entries: The illithidragon makes a Tail attack.

legendary.name: Wing Attack (Costs 2 Actions)
entries: The illithidragon beats its wings. Each creature within 10 feet of the illithidragon must succeed on a {@dc 19} Dexterity saving throw or take 13 ({@damage 2d6 + 6}) bludgeoning damage and be knocked {@condition prone}. The illithidragon can then fly up to half its flying speed.

resist.note: from nonmagical attacks that aren't silvered

trait.name: Legendary Resistance (3/Day)
entries: If the dragon fails a saving throw, it can choose to succeed instead.

trait.name: Magic Resistance
entries: Дракон имеет преимущество при бросках спасения против заклинаний и других магических эффектов.

action.name: Multiattack
entries: Дракон может использовать свое устрашающее присутствие. Затем он делает одну атаку "Укус" и две атаки "Когти".

action.name: Bite
entries: {@atk mw} +14 to hit, reach 10 ft., one target. {@h}19 ({@damage 2d10 + 8}) piercing damage plus 5 ({@damage 1d10}) fire damage.

action.name: Claw
entries: {@atk mw} +14 to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. {@h}15 ({@damage 2d6 + 8}) slashing damage.

action.name: Tail
entries: {@atk mw} +14 to hit, reach 15 ft., one target. {@h}17 ({@damage 2d8 + 8}) bludgeoning damage.

action.name: Frightful Presence
entries: Each creature of the dragon's choice that is within 120 feet of the dragon and aware of it must succeed on a {@dc 19} Wisdom saving throw or become {@condition frightened} for 1 minute. A creature can repeat the saving throw at the end of each of its turns, ending the effect on itself on a success. If a creature's saving throw is successful or the effect ends for it, the creature is immune to the dragon's Frightful Presence for the next 24 hours.

action.name: Hellfire Breath {@recharge 5}
entries: The dragon exhales hellfire in a 60-foot cone. Each creature in that area must make a {@dc 21} Constitution saving throw. On failed save, a creature takes 66 ({@damage 12d10}) fire damage and becomes vulnerable to fire damage until the end of its next turn. On a successful save, a creature takes half as much damage and suffers no other effects.

action.name: Change Shape
entries: Дракон магическим образом превращается в тифлинга или любого дьявола среднего размера. Он может вернуться в свою истинную форму как бонусное действие. Его статистика, за исключением размера, одинакова в каждой форме. Любое снаряжение, которое он носит или несет, не трансформируется. Он возвращается в свою истинную форму, если умирает.

bonus.name: Heated Body
entries: Дракон излучает огонь из своего тела. Существо, которое коснется дракона или ударит его атакой ближнего боя в радиусе 10 футов от него, когда нагретое тело активно, получает 5 ({@damage 1d10}) повреждений огнем. Нагретое тело остается до тех пор, пока дракон не умрет или пока он не сбросит его своим действием.

spellcasting.name: Innate Spellcasting
headerEntries: The dragon casts one of the following spells, requiring no material components and using Charisma as the spellcasting ability (spell save {@dc 19}, {@hit 11} to hit with spell attacks):

legendary.name: Detect
entries: The dragon makes a Wisdom ({@skill Perception}) check.

legendary.name: Charm
entries: The dragon casts charm person.

legendary.name: Fire Bolt
entries: The dragon casts fire bolt.

legendary.name: Tail Attack
entries: The dragon makes a Tail attack.

legendary.name: Wing Attack (Costs 2 Actions)
entries: The dragon beats its wings. Each creature within 10 feet of the dragon must succeed on a {@dc 22} Dexterity saving throw or take 15 ({@damage 2d6 + 8}) bludgeoning damage and be knocked {@condition prone}. The dragon can then fly up to half its flying speed.

trait.name: Incorporeal Movement
entries: The spectral dragon can move through other creatures and objects as if they were difficult terrain. It takes 5 ({@damage 1d10}) force damage if it ends its turn inside an object.

trait.name: Legendary Resistance (3/Day)
entries: If the dragon fails a saving throw, it can choose to succeed instead.

trait.name: Sunlight Sensitivity
entries: While in sunlight, the spectral dragon has disadvantage on attack rolls, as well as on Wisdom ({@skill Perception}) checks that rely on sight.

action.name: Multiattack
entries: Дракон может использовать свое устрашающее присутствие. Затем он делает одну атаку "Укус" и две атаки "Когти".

action.name: Bite
entries: {@atk mw} +10 to hit, reach 10 ft., one target. {@h}16 ({@damage 2d10 + 5}) necrotic damage plus 7 ({@damage 2d6}) poison damage. The target must succeed on a {@dc 19} Constitution saving throw or its hit point maximum is reduced by an amount equal to the necrotic damage taken. This reduction lasts until the creature finishes a long rest. The target dies if this effect reduces its hit point maximum to 0.

action.name: Claw
entries: {@atk mw} +10 to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. {@h}12 ({@damage 2d6 + 5}) necrotic damage.

action.name: Tail
entries: {@atk mw} +10 to hit, reach 15 ft., one target. {@h}14 ({@damage 2d8 + 5}) necrotic damage.

action.name: Frightful Presence
entries: Each creature of the dragon's choice that is within 120 feet of the dragon and aware of it must succeed on a {@dc 18} Wisdom saving throw or become {@condition frightened} for 1 minute. A creature can repeat the saving throw at the end of each of its turns, ending the effect on itself on a success. If a creature's saving throw is successful or the effect ends for it, the creature is immune to the dragon's Frightful Presence for the next 24 hours.

action.name: Necrotic Poison Breath {@recharge 5}
entries: The dragon exhales necrotic poisonous gas in a 60-foot cone. Each creature in that area must make a {@dc 18} Constitution saving throw, taking 28 ({@damage 8d6}) necrotic damage and 28 ({@damage 8d6}) poison damage on a failed save, or half as much damage on a successful one.

legendary.name: Detect
entries: The dragon makes a Wisdom ({@skill Perception}) check.

legendary.name: Tail Attack
entries: The dragon makes a Tail attack.

legendary.name: Wing Attack (Costs 2 Actions)
entries: The dragon beats its wings. Each creature within 15 feet of the dragon must succeed on a {@dc 18} Dexterity saving throw or take 12 ({@damage 2d6 + 5}) bludgeoning damage and be knocked {@condition prone}. The dragon can then fly up to half its flying speed.

trait.name: Legendary Resistance (3/Day)
entries: If the dragon fails a saving throw, it can choose to succeed instead.

trait.name: Mimicry
entries: Дракон может подражать звукам животных и голосам гуманоидов. Существо, которое слышит эти звуки, может определить, что это имитация, при успешной {@dc 14} проверке мудрости ({@skill Insight}).

action.name: Multiattack
entries: Дракон может использовать свое устрашающее присутствие. Затем он делает одну атаку "Укус" и две атаки "Когти".

action.name: Bite
entries: {@atk mw} +11 to hit, reach 10 ft., one target. {@h}20 ({@damage 4d6 + 6}) piercing damage plus 4 ({@damage 1d8}) acid damage.

action.name: Claw
entries: {@atk mw} +11 к попаданию, досягаемость 5 футов, одна цель. {@h}13 ({@damage 2d6 + 6}) косой урон.

action.name: Tail
entries: {@atk mw} +11 to hit, reach 15 ft., one target. Hit. 20 ({@damage 4d6 + 6}) piercing damage and if the target is a Large or smaller creature, it is {@condition grappled} (escape {@dc 19}). Until this grapple ends, the dragon can automatically hit the target with its tail, and the dragon can't attack another target with its tail.

action.name: Frightful Presence
entries: Каждое существо по выбору дракона, находящееся в пределах 120 футов от дракона и знающее о нем, должно успешно выполнить бросок спасброска на {@dc 14} Мудрость или стать {@condition frightened} на 1 минуту. Существо может повторять бросок спасброска в конце каждого своего хода, прекращая эффект на себя в случае успеха. Если бросок спасброска для существа успешен или эффект заканчивается для него, существо становится неуязвимым для "Страшного присутствия" дракона на следующие 24 часа.

action.name: Acid Breath {@recharge 5}
entries: The dragon exhales sticky, corrosive acid in a 60-foot cone. Each creature in that area must make a {@dc 19} Dexterity saving throw. On failed save, a creature takes 40 ({@damage 9d8}) acid damage immediately and 18 ({@damage 4d8}) acid damage at the end of its next turn. On a successful save, a creature takes half as much of the initial damage and no damage at the end of its next turn.

legendary.name: Detect
entries: The dragon makes a Wisdom ({@skill Perception}) check.

legendary.name: Tail Attack
entries: The dragon makes a Tail attack.

legendary.name: Wing Attack (Costs 2 Actions)
entries: The dragon beats its wings. Each creature within 10 feet of the dragon must succeed on a {@dc 19} Dexterity saving throw or take 13 ({@damage 2d6 + 6}) bludgeoning damage and be knocked {@condition prone}. The dragon can then fly up to half its flying speed.

trait.name: Hold Breath
entries: Дракон может задерживать дыхание на 30 минут или пока не использует кислотное дыхание.

trait.name: Legendary Resistance (3/Day)
entries: If the dragon fails a saving throw, it can choose to succeed instead.

trait.name: Sand Camouflage
entries: Дракон имеет преимущество при проверке ловкости ({@skill Stealth}), чтобы спрятаться в песчаной местности.

action.name: Multiattack
entries: Дракон может использовать свое устрашающее присутствие. Затем он делает одну атаку "Укус" и две атаки "Когти".

action.name: Bite
entries: {@atk mw} +11 to hit, reach 10 ft., one target. {@h}17 ({@damage 2d10 + 6}) piercing damage plus 5 ({@damage 1d10}) acid damage.

action.name: Claw
entries: {@atk mw} +11 к попаданию, досягаемость 5 футов, одна цель. {@h}13 ({@damage 2d6 + 6}) косой урон.

action.name: Tail
entries: {@atk mw} +11 to hit, reach 15 ft., one target. {@h}15 ({@damage 2d8 + 6}) bludgeoning damage.

action.name: Frightful Presence
entries: Каждое существо по выбору дракона, находящееся в пределах 120 футов от дракона и знающее о нем, должно успешно выполнить бросок спасброска на {@dc 16} Мудрость или стать {@condition frightened} на 1 минуту. Существо может повторять бросок спасброска в конце каждого своего хода, прекращая эффект на себя в случае успеха. Если бросок спасброска для существа успешен или эффект заканчивается для него, существо становится неуязвимым для "Страшного присутствия" дракона на следующие 24 часа.

action.name: Acid Breath {@recharge 5}
entries: The dragon exhales corrosive sand in a 60-foot line that is 5 feet wide. Each creature in that area must make a {@dc 19} Dexterity saving throw. On a failed save, a creature takes 54 ({@damage 12d8}) acid damage and is {@condition blinded} until the end of its next turn. On a successful save, a creature takes half as much damage and isn't {@condition blinded}.

legendary.name: Detect
entries: The dragon makes a Wisdom ({@skill Perception}) check.

legendary.name: Tail Attack
entries: The dragon makes a Tail attack.

legendary.name: Sand Tornado (Costs 2 Actions)
entries: The dragon burrows into the ground in a violent circling motion, whipping its tail and spraying sand around it. Each creature within 10 feet of the dragon must succeed on a {@dc 19} Constitution saving throw or take 15 ({@damage 2d8 + 6}) bludgeoning damage and be {@condition blinded} until the end of its next turn. The dragon can then move up to its burrow speed.

monster.name: Adamantine Golem

immune.note: from nonmagical attacks that aren't adamantine

languages: understands the languages of its creator but can't speak

trait.name: Immutable Form
entries: Голем невосприимчив к любому заклинанию или эффекту, который изменит его форму.

trait.name: Limited Magic Immunity
entries: The golem can't be affected or detected by spells of 6th level or lower. It has advantage on saving throws against all other spells and magical effects.

trait.name: Magic Weapons
entries: Оружейные атаки голема являются магическими.

trait.name: Siege Monster
entries: The golem deals double damage to objects and structures.

action.name: Multiattack
entries: The golem makes two Slam attacks.

action.name: Slam
entries: {@atk mw} +17 to hit, reach 10 ft., one target. {@h}32 ({@damage 5d8 + 10}) bludgeoning damage and the target must succeed on a {@dc 25} Strength saving throw or the Armor Class (AC) of the armor or shield (determined randomly) of the target takes a permanent and cumulative -1 penalty. If its Armor Class drops to 0, the armor or shield is destroyed. If the armor or shield is magical, the target gains advantage on the saving throw.

action.name: Crushing Stride
entries: The golem moves up to its speed in a straight line. During this move, it can enter Large or smaller creatures' spaces. A creature whose space the golem enters must succeed on a {@dc 25} Dexterity saving throw. On a successful save, the creature is pushed 5 feet to the nearest space out of the golem's path. On a failed save, the creature falls {@condition prone} and takes 32 ({@damage 5d8 + 10}) bludgeoning damage. If the golem remains in the prone creature's space, the creature is also {@condition restrained} until it's no longer in the same space as the golem. While {@condition restrained} in this way, the creature, or another creature within 5 feet of it, can make a {@dc 25} Strength check. On a success, the creature is shunted to an unoccupied space of its choice within 5 feet of the golem and is no longer {@condition restrained}.

action.name: Earthquake Smash {@recharge 5}
entries: The golem slams the ground, triggering an earth tremor and violently pelting the area with debris. Each creature on the ground in a 20-foot cube originating from the golem must succeed on a {@dc 25} Constitution saving throw. On a failed save, a creature takes 55 ({@damage 10d8 + 10}) bludgeoning damage, is knocked {@condition prone}, and {@condition stunned} until the end of its next turn. On a successful save, a creature takes half as much damage and is neither knocked {@condition prone} or {@condition stunned}.

monster.name: Goblin Peacemaker of Bargrivyek

action.name: Multiattack
entries: The goblin makes two Flail attacks or makes one Flail attack and casts a spell that has a casting time of 1 action.

action.name: Flail
entries: {@atk mw} {@hit 3} to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. {@h}5 ({@damage 1d8 + 1}) bludgeoning damage.

action.name: Immobilizing Smite
entries: When the goblin hits a creature with a weapon attack, it can use a bonus action to expend a 1st level spell slot to deal 4 ({@damage 1d8}) force damage to the target. The target must succeed on a {@dc 12} Wisdom saving throw or be {@condition paralyzed} for 1 minute. A {@condition paralyzed} target can repeat the saving throw at the end of each of its turns, ending the effect on itself on a success. If the goblin expends a spell slot of 2nd level or higher, the extra force damage increases by {@dice 1d8} for each level above 1st (maximum {@dice 3d8}).

action.name: Nimble Escape
entries: The goblin takes the {@action Disengage} or {@action Hide} action as a bonus action on each of its turns.

spellcasting.name: Innate Spellcasting
headerEntries: The goblin casts one of the following spells using Wisdom as the spellcasting ability (spell save {@dc 12}, {@hit 4} to hit with spell attacks):

legendaryHeader: The goblin can take 3 legendary actions, choosing from the options
below. Only one legendary action option can be used at a time and
only at the end of another creature's turn. The goblin regains spent
legendary actions at the start of its turn.

legendary.name: Move
entries: The goblin moves up to half its speed without provoking
{@action opportunity attack|PHB|opportunity attacks}.

legendary.name: Flail
entries: The goblin makes a Flail attack.

legendary.name: Cast a Spell (Costs 2 Actions)
entries: The goblin uses Spellcasting.

monster.name: Druj Eye
languages: the languages it knew in life but it can't speak

trait.name: Aura of Annihilation
entries: The druj can activate or deactivate this feature as a bonus action. While active, the aura deals 5 necrotic damage to any creature that ends its turn within 30 feet of the druj. Undead and fiends ignore this effect.

trait.name: Magic Resistance
entries: The druj has advantage on saving throws against spells and other magical effects.

trait.name: Sunlight Sensitivity
entries: While in sunlight, the druj has disadvantage on attack rolls, as well as on Wisdom ({@skill Perception}) checks that rely on sight.

action.name: Life Drain
entries: {@atk mw} {@hit 7} to hit, reach 5 ft., one creature. {@h}17 ({@damage 3d8 + 4}) necrotic damage. The target must succeed on a {@dc 13} Constitution saving throw or its hit point maximum is reduced by an amount equal to the damage taken. This reduction lasts until the target finishes a long rest. The target dies if this effect reduces its hit point maximum to 0.

A humanoid slain by this attack rises 24 hours later as a {@creature zombie} under the druj's control, unless the humanoid is restored to life or its body is destroyed. The druj can have no more than twelve {@creature zombie|mm|zombies under its control at one time.

action.name: Terrifying Glare
entries: The druj targets one creature it can see within 30 feet of it. If the target can see the druj, the target must succeed on a {@dc 13} Wisdom saving throw or be magically frightened for 1 minute. The {@condition frightened} target is {@condition paralyzed}. A creature can repeat the saving throw at the end of each of its turns, ending the effect on itself on a success.

spellcasting.name: Innate Spellcasting
headerEntries: The druj casts one of the following spells, requiring no material components and using Wisdom as the spellcasting ability (spell save {@dc 14}, {@hit 6} to hit with spell attacks):

trait.name: Magic Resistance
entries: Эладрин имеет преимущество в бросках спасения против заклинаний и других магических эффектов.

trait.name: Sorrowful Presence
entries: Any non-eladrin creature that starts its turn within 60 feet of the eladrin must make a {@dc 11} Wisdom saving throw. On a failed save, the creature becomes {@condition charmed} by the eladrin for 1 minute. While {@condition charmed} in this way, the creature has disadvantage on ability checks and saving throws. The {@condition charmed} creature can repeat the saving throw at the end of each of its turns, ending the effect on itself on a success. If a creature's saving throw is successful or the effect ends for it, the creature is immune to any eladrin's Sorrowful Presence for the next 24 hours.

action.name: Longsword
entries: {@atk mw} {@hit 2} to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. {@h}4 ({@damage 1d8}) slashing damage, or 5 ({@damage 1d10}) slashing damage if used with two hands.

action.name: Longbow
entries: {@atk rw} {@hit 2} to hit, range 150/600 ft., one target. {@h}4 ({@damage 1d8}) piercing damage.

bonus.name: Fey Step {@recharge 4}
entries: Эладрин телепортируется на расстояние до 30 футов в незанятое пространство, которое он может видеть.

reaction.name: Frigid Rebuke
entries: When the eladrin takes damage from a creature the eladrin can see within 30 feet of it, the eladrin can force that creature to succeed on a {@dc 13} Constitution saving throw or take 5 ({@damage 1d10}) cold damage.

spellcasting.name: Innate Spellcasting
headerEntries: The eladrin casts one of the following spells, requiring no material components and using Intelligence as the spellcasting ability (spell save {@dc 13}):

monster.name: Gnoll War Leader of Yeenoghu

trait.name: Aura of Bloodlust
entries: When any creature starts its turn within 20 feet of the gnoll, that creature must succeed on a {@dc 13} Wisdom saving throw, or it must immediately take the {@action Attack} action, making one melee attack against a random creature within reach. If no creatures are within reach, it makes a ranged attack against a random creature within range, throwing its weapon if necessary.
At the start of each of its turns, the gnoll can suppress this aura until the start of its next turn.

trait.name: Legendary Resistance (1/Day)
entries: If the gnolls fails a saving throw, it can choose to succeed instead.

action.name: Multiattack
entries: The gnoll makes three melee attacks: one with its Bite and two with its Battleaxe.

action.name: Bite
entries: {@atk mw} {@hit 6} to hit, reach 5 ft., one creature. {@h}5 ({@damage 1d4 + 3}) piercing damage.

action.name: Battleaxe
entries: {@atk mw} {@hit 6} to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. {@h}7 ({@damage 1d8 + 3}) slashing damage, or 8 ({@damage 1d10 + 3}) slashing damage if used with two hands.

action.name: Longbow
entries: {@atk rw} {@hit 5} to hit, range 150/600 ft., one target. {@h}6 ({@damage 1d8 + 2}) piercing damage.

action.name: Rampage
entries: When the gnoll reduces a creature to 0 hit points with a melee attack on its turn, the gnoll can take a bonus action to move up to half its speed and make a Bite attack.

bonus.name: Yeenoghu's Divine Fury (Recharges after a Long Rest)
entries: The gnoll magically infuses its attacks with divine energy. For 1 minute, the first creature the gnoll hits on each of its turns with a weapon attack takes 9 ({@damage 1d6 + 6}) necrotic damage and must make a {@dc 14} Wisdom saving throw or be {@condition frightened} of the gnoll until the end of the gnoll's next turn.

bonus.name: Zealous Presence (Recharges after a Short or Long Rest)
entries: The gnoll unleashes a battle cry infused with divine energy. Up to ten other creatures of its choice within 60 feet of it that can hear it gain advantage on attack rolls and saving throws until the start of its next turn.

legendaryHeader: The gnoll gains 3 legendary actions, choosing from the options
below. Only one legendary action option can be used at a time and
only at the end of another creature's turn. The gnoll regains spent
legendary actions at the start of its turn.

legendary.name: Charge
entries: The gnoll moves up to its speed.

legendary.name: Command Gnoll
entries: The gnoll targets one allied gnoll it can see within 30 feet of it. If the target can see or hear the gnoll, the target can use its reaction to make one melee attack or move up to its speed.

legendary.name: Attack (Costs 2 Actions)
entries: The gnoll makes a melee or ranged attack.

monster.name: Nagahydra

trait.name: Legendary Resistance (3/Day)
entries: If the nagahydra fails a saving throw, it can choose to succeed instead.

trait.name: Multiple Heads
entries: The nagahydra has five heads. While it has more than one head, it has advantage on Wisdom ({@skill Perception}) checks and on saving throws against being {@condition blinded}, charmed, deafened, frightened, stunned, and knocked {@condition unconscious}.

Whenever the nagahydra takes 50 or more damage in a single turn, one of its heads dies (determined randomly). If all its heads die, the nagahydra dies. At the end of its turn, it grows one head that died since its last turn, unless it has taken fire damage since its last turn. The nagahydra regains 30 hit points each time it regrows a head in this way.

trait.name: Multiheaded Spellcaster
entries: Each head of the nagahydra can cast and maintain concentration of its own spell. If the nagahydra is forced to make a Constitution saving throw to maintain concentration on any of its spells, each head that has an active spell requiring concentration must make that saving throw.

trait.name: Rejuvenation
entries: If it dies, the nagahydra returns to life in {@dice 1d6} days and regains all its hit points. Only a {@spell wish} spell can prevent this trait from functioning.

trait.name: Reactive Heads
entries: For each head the nagahydra has beyond one, it gets an extra reaction that can be used only for {@action opportunity attack|PHB|opportunity attacks}.

trait.name: Spell Penetration
entries: When the naga casts a spell and is interrupted by an enemy's {@spell counterspell}, treat the spell's level as 3 levels higher.

trait.name: Wakeful
entries: While the nagahydra sleeps, at least one of its heads is awake.

action.name: Tail
entries: {@atk mw} +11 to hit, reach 10 ft., one creature. {@h}15 ({@damage 3d6 + 5}) bludgeoning damage, and it must succeed on a {@dc 19} Dexterity saving throw or be pushed up to 10 feet away and be knocked {@condition prone}.

spellcasting.name: Innate Spellcasting
headerEntries: The naga casts one of the following spells, requiring only verbal components and Charisma as the spellcasting abilit (spell save {@dc 19}, {@hit 11} to hit with spell attacks):
footerEntries: *The nagahydra casts these spells on itself before combat.

legendaryHeader: The nagahydra can take as many legendary actions as it has heads, choosing from the options below. Only one legendary action option can be used at a time and only at the end of another creature's turn. The nagahydra regains spent legendary actions at the start of its turn. The nagahydra's legendary action options are associated with its five naga heads (a bite and a cast spell for each). Once the nagahydra chooses a legendary action option for one of its heads, it can't choose another one associated with that head until the start of its next turn.

legendary.name: Bite
entries: Melee Weapon {@action Attack}: +11 to hit, reach 10 ft., one creature. Hit: 7 ({@damage 1d6 + 4}) piercing damage, and the target must make a {@dc 19} Constitution saving throw, taking 13 ({@damage 3d8}) poison damage on a failed save, or half as much damage on a successful one.

legendary.name: Cast a Spell (Costs 2 Actions)
entries: The nagahydra uses Spellcasting.

legendaryGroup.name: Purple Dragon
lairActions: On initiative count 20 (losing initiative ties), the dragon takes a lair action to cause one of the following effects; the dragon can't use the same effect two rounds in a row:

items: Stalactites fall from the ceiling, striking up to three creatures underneath that the dragon can see within 120 feet of it. The dragon makes one ranged attack roll ({@hit 7} to hit) against each target. On a hit, the target takes 10 ({@damage 3d6}) piercing damage.

The dragon chooses a 10-foot-square area on the ground that it can see within 120 feet of it. The ground in that area turns into 3-foot-deep mud. Each creature on the ground in that area when the mud appears must succeed on a {@dc 15} Dexterity saving throw or sink into the mud and become {@condition restrained}. A creature can take an action to attempt a {@dc 15} Strength check, freeing itself or another creature within its reach and ending the {@condition restrained} condition on a success. Moving 1 foot in the mud costs 2 feet of movement. On initiative count 20 on the next round, the mud hardens, and the Strength DC to work free increases to 20.

One creature the dragon can see within 120 feet of it must succeed on a {@dc 13} Wisdom saving throw or be {@condition charmed} by the dragon as if the dragon had cast dominate monster on it. The effect ends on initiative count 20 on the next round. When the effect ends, the creature reappears in the space it left or in the nearest unoccupied space if that one is occupied.

regionalEffects: The region containing a legendary purple dragon's lair is warped by the dragon's magic, which creates one or more of the following effects:

items: Giant fungi form labyrinthine passages within 1 mile of the dragon's lair. The giant fungi act as 10-foot-high, 10-foot-thick walls that block line of sight. Creatures can squeeze between the giant mushrooms, with every 1 foot a creature moves costing it 4 feet of movement. A creature in the stalagmites must make a {@dc 15} Constitution saving throw once each round it's in contact with the giant fungi or take 3 ({@damage 1d6}) poison damage from the toxic spores. Each 10-foot-cube of giant mushrooms has AC 5, 30 hit points, resistance to bludgeoning and piercing damage, vulnerability to fire damage, and immunity to psychic and thunder damage.
Shadows cast by non-evil creatures within 6 miles of the dragon's lair randomly animate and form nightmarish but harmless silhouettes, warning such creatures of the danger.
Bats, centipedes, spiders, and other underground vermin within 1 mile of the dragon's lair serve as the dragon's eyes and ears.

regionalEffects: If the dragon dies, the vermin lose their supernatural link to it. The giant fungi remain, but within {@dice 1d10} days, they become mundane fungi and normal difficult terrain, losing their toxicity.

legendaryGroup.name: Gray Dragon
lairActions: On initiative count 20 (losing initiative ties), the dragon takes a lair action to cause one of the following effects; the dragon can't use the same effect two rounds in a row:

items: The dragon chooses a point on the ground that it can see within 120 feet of it. Stone spikes sprout from the ground in a 20-foot radius centered on that point. The effect is otherwise identical to the {@spell spike growth} spell and lasts until the dragon uses this lair action again or until the dragon dies.

A tremor shakes the lair in a 60-foot radius around the dragon. Each creature other than the dragon on the ground in that area must succeed on a {@dc 15} Dexterity saving throw or be knocked {@condition prone}.

The dragon creates a wall of earth on a solid surface it can see within 120 feet of it. The wall can be up to 30 feet long, 30 feet high, and 1 foot thick. When the wall appears, each creature within its area is pushed 5 feet out of the wall's space, appearing on whichever side of the wall it wants. Each 10-foot section of the wall has AC 5, 30 hit points, resistant to bludgeoning, piercing, and slashing from nonmagical attacks that aren't adamantine, and immunity to necrotic, poison, and psychic damage. The wall disappears when the dragon uses this lair action again or when the dragon dies.

regionalEffects: The region containing a legendary gray dragon's lair is warped by the dragon's magic, which creates one or more of the following effects:

items: Small earthquakes are common within 6 miles of the dragon's lair.
{@creature earth elemental|mm|Earth elementals} scour the land within 6 miles of the lair.
Rocky fissures within 1 mile of the dragon's lair form portals to he Elemental Plane of Earth, allowing creatures of elemental earth into the world to dwell nearby.

regionalEffects: If the dragon dies, the {@creature earth elemental|mm|earth elementals} disappear immediately, and the other effects fade over the course of {@dice 1d10} days.

legendaryGroup.name: Brown Dragon
lairActions: On initiative count 20 (losing initiative ties), the dragon takes a lair action to cause one of the following effects; the dragon can't use the same effect two rounds in a row:

items: Part of the ceiling collapses above one creature that the dragon can see within 120 feet of it. The creature must succeed on a {@dc 15} Dexterity saving throw or take 10 ({@damage 3d6}) bludgeoning damage and be knocked {@condition prone} and buried. The buried target is {@condition restrained} and unable to breathe or stand up. A creature can take an action to make a {@dc 10} Strength check, ending the buried state on a success.

A cloud of sand swirls about in a 20-foot-radius sphere centered on a point the dragon can see within 120 feet of it. The cloud spreads around corners. Each creature in the cloud must succeed on a {@dc 15} Constitution saving throw or be {@condition blinded} for 1 minute. A creature can repeat the saving throw at the end of each of its turns, ending the effect on itself on a success.

Noxious chlorine gases form a cloud in a 20-foot-radius sphere centered on a point the dragon can see within 120 feet of it. The sphere spreads around corners, and its area is lightly obscured. It lasts until initiative count 20 on the next round. Each creature that starts its turn in the cloud must succeed on a {@dc 15} Constitution saving throw or be {@condition poisoned} until the end of its turn.

regionalEffects: The region containing a legendary brown dragon's lair is warped by the dragon's magic, which creates one or more of the following effects:

items: Sandstorms rage within 6 miles of the lair.
{@creature ooze paraelemental|MonsterManualExpanded3|Ooze paraelementals} scour the land within 6 miles of the lair.

Hidden sinkholes form in and around the dragon's lair. A sinkhole can be spotted from a safe distance with a successful {@dc 20} Wisdom ({@skill Perception}) check. Otherwise, the first creature to step on the thin crust covering the sinkhole must succeed on a {@dc 15} Dexterity saving throw or fall {@dice 1d6 × 10} feet into the sinkhole.

regionalEffects: If the dragon dies, the {@creature ooze paraelemental|MonsterManualExpanded3|ooze paraelementals} disappear immediately, and the sandstorms abate within {@dice 1d10} days. Any sinkholes remain where they are.

legendaryGroup.name: Maligno
lairActions: On initiative count 20 (losing initiative ties), the maligno takes a lair action to cause one of the following effects; the maligno can't use the same effect two rounds in a row:

items: The maligno casts {@spell bestow curse} (no components required) and doesn't need to maintain concentration of the spell. The effect ends after 1 minute, or if the anito uses this lair action again.

The maligno casts {@spell entangle} (no components required) and doesn't need to maintain concentration of the spell. A creature that starts its turn restrained takes 5 ({@damage 2d4}) piercing damage from thorns. The effect ends after 1 minute, or if the maligno uses this lair action again.

The maligno unleashes a wave of madness. Each creature within 60 feet of it must succeed on a {@dc 17} Wisdom saving throw or must use its reaction to move up to half its speed toward a creature of the maligno's choice that it can see and make one weapon attack against it.

regionalEffects: The region containing a maligno's lair is warped by the maligno's magic, which creates one or more of the following effects:

items: Once per day, the maligno can alter the weather in a 6-mile radius centered on its lair. The maligno doesn't need to be outdoors; otherwise the effect is identical to the {@spell control weather} spell.
Beasts and plant creatures within 1 mile of the lair become evil and violent—even creatures that are normally docile.

Thickets form labyrinthine passages within 1 mile of the maligno's lair. The thickets act as 10-foot-high, 10-foot-thick walls that block line of sight. Creatures can move through the thickets, with every 1 foot a creature moves costing it 4 feet of movement. A creature in the thickets must make a {@dc 15} Dexterity saving throw once each round it's in contact with the thickets or take 3 ({@damage 1d6}) piercing damage from thorns. Each 10-foot-cube of thickets has AC 5, 30 hit points, resistance to bludgeoning and piercing damage, vulnerability to fire damage, and immunity to psychic and thunder damage.

regionalEffects: If the maligno dies, the effects fade over the course of {@dice 1d10} days.

legendaryGroup.name: Hierophant of Annihilation
lairActions: On initiative count 20 (losing initiative ties), the hierophant takes a lair action to cause one of the following effects; the hierophant can't use the same effect two rounds in a row:

items: The hierophant innately casts {@spell chill touch}.
The hierophant innately casts {@spell dispel magic}.

The hierophant causes up to three corpses within the lair to rise as {@creature skeleton|mm|skeletons}, {@creature zombie|mm|zombies}, or {@creature ghoul|mm|ghouls}. These undead obey its telepathic commands, which can reach anywhere in the lair.

regionalEffects: The region containing a hierophant's lair is warped by the hierophant's foul magic, which creates one or more of the following effects:

items: All normal plant life within 1 mile of the lair wither and die and water sources within 1 mile of the lair are supernaturally fouled. Creatures that drink such water regurgitate it within minutes.

Beasts must make a {@dc 15} Wisdom saving throw at the end of each minute spent within 1 mile of the lair or become {@condition frightened} until they are no longer within 1 mile of the lair. While {@condition frightened} in this way, the beast must take the {@action Dash} action and move away from the lair by the safest available route on each of its turns, unless there is nowhere to move, in which case it needn'ttake the {@action Dash} action. The beast can repeat the saving throw at the end of each of its turns, ending the effect on itself on a success. If a beast's saving throw is successful or the effect ends for it, the creature is immune to this regional effect for the next 24 hours.

{@creature skeleton|mm|Skeletons}, {@creature zombie|mm|zombies}, {@creature ghoul|mm|ghouls}, {@creature ghast|mm|ghasts}, and {@creature wight|mm|wights} within 1 mile of the hierophant's lair serve as the hierophant's eyes and ears.

regionalEffects: If the hierophant dies, these effects fade over the course of 1–10 days.

legendaryGroup.name: Ha-naga
lairActions: On initiative count 20 (losing initiative ties), the ha-naga takes a lair action to cause one of the following effects; the ha-naga can't use the same effect two rounds in a row.

items: The ha-naga targets one creature it can see within 60 feet of it. The target must succeed on a {@dc 20} Wisdom saving throw or become {@condition frightened} until the end of its next turn. While {@condition frightened} in this way, the creature is {@condition paralyzed}.

Powerful winds buffet the lair in a 60-foot radius around the ha-naga. Each creature other than the ha-naga in that area must succeed on a {@dc 20} Strength saving throw or take 10 ({@damage 3d6}) bludgeoning damage and be knocked {@condition prone}.

The ha-naga targets one friendly reptilian creature it can sense within 60 feet of it. If the target can see or hear the ha-naga, it can use its reaction to move up to half its speed and make one melee or ranged attack.

regionalEffects: The region containing a legendary brown ha-naga's lair is warped by the ha-naga's magic, which creates one or more of the following effects:

items: Once per day, the ha-naga can alter the weather in a 6-mile radius centered on its lair. The ha-naga doesn't need to be outdoors; otherwise the effect is identical to the {@spell control weather} spell.
Fog lightly obscures the land within 6 miles of the lair.
Reptiles within 1 mile of the ha-naga's lair serve as the ha-naga's eyes and ears.

regionalEffects: If the ha-naga dies, the effects fade over the course of {@dice 1d10} days.

legendaryGroup.name: Diwata
lairActions: On initiative count 20 (losing initiative ties), the diwata takes a lair action to cause one of the following effects; the diwata can't use the same effect two rounds in a row.

items: A strong wind blows around the diwata. Each creature within 60 feet of the diwata must succeed on a {@dc 19} Strength saving throw or be pushed 15 feet away from the dragon and knocked {@condition prone}. Gases and vapors are dispersed by the wind, and unprotected flames are extinguished. Protected flames, such as lanterns, have a {@chance 50} chance of being extinguished.

Up to three creatures the diwata can see within 60 feet of it must succeed on a {@dc 19} Wisdom saving throw or fall into a deep sleep and become {@condition unconscious}. An {@condition unconscious} creature can repeat the saving throw at the end of each of its turns, ending the effect on itself on a success. If the {@condition unconscious} creature takes damage, or someone uses an action to shake or slap it awake, it gains advantage on its next saving throw.

regionalEffects: The region containing a diwata's lair is warped by the diwata's magic, which creates one or more of the following effects:

items: Once per day, the diwata can alter the weather or end an earthquake in a 6-mile radius centered on its lair. The diwata doesn't need to be outdoors; otherwise the effect is identical to the {@spell control weather} spell.

Plants and trees within 6 miles of the diwata's lair are bursting with greenery, flowers, and fruits as if in summer. The smell of lilies, hyacinths, and lilacs fill the air and colorful butterflies flitter about the area.

Tiny beasts, such as rodents and birds, that are normally unable to speak gain the magical ability to speak and understand Common, Elven, and Fey while within 1 mile of the diwata's lair. These creatures speak well of the diwata, but can't divulge its whereabouts.

regionalEffects: If the diwata dies, the effects fade over the course of {@dice 1d10} days.

legendaryGroup.name: Deepspawn
lairActions: On initiative count 20 (losing initiative ties), the deepspawn takes a lair action to cause one of the following effects; the deepspawn can't use the same effect two rounds in a row.

items: The deepspawn casts {@spell hold monster}.
The deepspawn regrows a tentacle; or regains 35 hit points and ends {@condition blinded|phb|blindness}, {@condition deafened|phb|deafness}, and any diseases affecting it.

The deepspawn targets one spawn it can sense within 120 feet of it. The target has a flash of inspiration and gains advantage on one attack roll, ability check, or saving throw it makes before the end of its next turn. If the target doesn't or can't use this benefit in that time, the inspiration is lost.

regionalEffects: The region containing a legendary deepspawn's lair is warped by the deepspawn's magic, which creates one or more of the following effects:

items: The land within 6 miles of the lair takes twice as long as normal to traverse, since the vegetation grow thick and twisted, the swamps are thick with reeking mud, and sharp, rocky outcroppings choke pathways.
Spawns in the lair have advantage on saving throws against being charmed or {@condition frightened}.
Spawns within 1 mile of the deepspawn's lair serve as the deepspawn's eyes and ears.

regionalEffects: If the deepspawn dies, these effects fade over the course of 1-10 days.

legendaryGroup.name: Anito
lairActions: On initiative count 20 (losing initiative ties), the anito takes a lair action to cause one of the following effects; the anito can't use the same effect two rounds in a row:

items: The anito casts {@spell bestow curse} (no components required) and doesn't need to maintain concentration of the spell. The effect ends after 1 minute, or if the anito uses this lair action again.
The anito casts {@spell entangle} (no components required) and doesn't need to maintain concentration of the spell. The effect ends after 1 minute, or if the anito uses this lair action again.

Each creature the anito can see within 60 feet of it must succeed on a {@dc 16} Wisdom saving throw or become {@condition frightened} of the anito for 1 minute. A {@condition frightened} creature can repeat the saving throw at the end of each of its turns ending the effect on itself on a success. If a creature's saving throw is successful or the effect ends for it, the creature is immune to this lair effect for the next 24 hours.

regionalEffects: The region containing an anito's lair is warped by the anito's magic, which creates one or more of the following effects:

items: Once per day, the anito can alter the weather in a 6-mile radius centered on its lair. The anito doesn't need to be outdoors; otherwise the effect is identical to the {@spell control weather} spell.
The land within 6 miles of the lair takes twice as long as normal to traverse, since the vegetation grow thick and twisted.
Medium or smaller woodland beasts within 1 mile of the anito's lair serve as the anito's eyes and ears.

regionalEffects: If the anito dies, the effects fade over the course of {@dice 1d10} days.

legendaryGroup.name: Adult Illithidragon
lairActions: On initiative count 20 (losing initiative ties), the illithidragon takes a lair action to cause one of the following effects; the illithidragon can't use the same effect two rounds in a row:

items: The illithidragon casts telekinesis (no components required). While maintaining concentration on this effect, the illithidragon can't take other lair actions.

One creature the illithidragon can see within 120 feet of it must succeed on a {@dc 13} Wisdom saving throw or be {@condition charmed} by the illithidragon as if the dragon had cast dominate monster on it. The effect ends on initiative count 20 on the next round. When the effect ends, the creature reappears in the space it left or in the nearest unoccupied space if that one is occupied.

regionalEffects: The region containing a legendary illithidragon's lair is warped by the illithidragon's magic, which creates one or more of the following effects:

items: Whenever a creature sleeps or enters a state of trance within 6 miles of the illithidragon's lair, it experiences a haunting nightmare and wakes up, its rest interrupted.
Non-evil creatures within 6 miles of the illithidragon's lair randomly hear whispered voices in their heads.
Plants, fungi, and animals within 1 mile of the of the illithidragon's lair have twisted, aberrant forms and tentacles.

regionalEffects: If the illithidragon dies, the vermin lose their supernatural link to it. The giant fungi remain, but within {@dice 1d10} days, they become mundane fungi and normal difficult terrain, losing their toxicity.

legendaryGroup.name: Adult Hellfire Wyrm
lairActions: On initiative count 20 (losing initiative ties), the dragon takes a lair action to cause one of the following effects; the dragon can't use the same effect two rounds in a row:

items: A storm made up of sheets of roaring flame appears in a location the dragon chooses within 120 feet of it. The area of the storm consists of up to eight 10-foot cubes, which the dragon can arrange as it wishes. Each cube must have at least one face adjacent to the face of another cube. Each creature in the area must make a {@dc 15} Dexterity saving throw. It takes 22 ({@damage 4d10}) fire damage on a failed save, or half as much damage on a successful one. The fire damages objects in the area and ignites flammable objects that aren't being worn or carried.

The dragon targets one creature it can see within 60 feet of it. The target must succeed on a {@dc 13} Wisdom saving throw or become {@condition paralyzed} for 1 minute. A creature can repeat the saving throw at the end of each of its turns, ending the effect on itself on a success.

The dragon creates an opaque wall of fire on a solid surface it can see within 120 feet of it. The wall can be up to 30 feet long, 30 feet high, and 1 foot thick. When the wall appears, each creature within its area must make a {@dc 15} Dexterity saving throw. On a failed save, a creature takes 18 ({@damage 4d8}) fire damage, or half as much damage on a successful save. Each side of the wall deals 9 ({@damage 2d8}) fire damage to each creature that ends its turn within 10 feet of that side or inside the wall. A creature takes the same damage when it enters the wall for the first time on a turn or ends its turn there. The wall disappears when the dragon uses this lair action again or when the dragon dies.

regionalEffects: The region containing a legendary hellfire wyrm's lair is warped by the dragon's magic, which creates one or more of the following effects:

items: Unbearably hot, sulfuric smoke obscures the land within 6 miles of the dragon's lair. Creatures take 3 ({@damage 1d6}) poison damage and 3 ({@damage 1d6}) fire damage at the end of hour spent in the area.
Water sources within 1 mile of the lair are supernaturally warm and tainted by sulfur.

Rocky fissures within 1 mile of the dragon's lair form portals to the Nine Hells, allowing {@creature hell hound|MM|hell hounds} and lesser devils ({@filter CR 5 or less|bestiary|tag=devil|challenge rating=[&0;&5]}) into the world to dwell nearby.

regionalEffects: If the dragon dies, the devils disappear immediately, and the other effects fade over the course of {@dice 1d10} days.

legendaryGroup.name: Nagahydra
lairActions: On initiative count 20 (losing initiative ties), the nagahydra takes a lair action to cause one of the following effects; the nagahydra can't use the same effect two rounds in a row.

items: The nagahydra causes spectral snakes to appear from a point it can see within 120 feet of it. Each creature within 20 feet of that point take 7 ({@damage 2d6}) piercing damage and must succeed on a {@dc 17} Constitution saving throw or become {@condition poisoned} until the end of its next turn. While {@condition poisoned} in this way, the creature has disadvantage on all saving throws.
The nagahydra targets up to five creatures it can see within 60 feet of it. The target must succeed on a {@dc 19} Wisdom saving throw or become {@condition frightened} until the end of its next turn.
The nagahydra regrows one of its heads.

regionalEffects: The region containing a nagahydra's lair is warped by the nagahydra's magic, which creates one or more of the following effects:

items: The land within 6 miles of the lair takes twice as long as normal to traverse, since the vegetation grow thick and twisted.
Within 1 mile of its lair, the nagahydra ignores movement impediments and damage from normal plants. The plants remove themselves from the nagahydra's path.
Fog lightly obscures the land within 6 miles of the lair.

regionalEffects: If the nagahydra dies, these effects fade over the course of 1-10 days.
